programme.title: Puppy Bowl XXI (S21)
小狗碗 XXI (S21)
programme.desc: The cutest competition is back for its 21st year! Puppy Bowl XXI features 142 rescue pups as they embark on their journey from shelter to stardom.(n)
最可爱的比赛又回来了，今年已经是第 21 届了！ Puppy Bowl XXI 共有 142 只救援小狗踏上从收容所到明星的旅程。(n)

programme.title: Wild Assassins (S1)
狂野刺客 (S1)
programme.desc: Masters of the sky, these airborne assassins come in all shapes and sizes.(n)
天空的主人，这些空中刺客的形状和大小各异。(n)

programme.title: Little Giants (S1)
小巨人 (S1)
programme.desc: When one thinks of dominant animals that roam the earth, large predators - lions, grizzlies and titanic anacondas come to mind.(n)
当人们想到在地球上漫步的主要动物时，人们就会想到大型食肉动物——狮子、灰熊和巨蟒。(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees (S10)
斗牛士和假释犯 (S10)
programme.desc: Tania is shocked by what she finds once she gets a stray dog back to the rescue. An empty nester brings her family to Villalobos to help her find a companion.(n)
当塔尼亚救回一只流浪狗时，她对所发现的一切感到震惊。 一名空巢老人带着家人来到维拉洛博斯帮助她寻找伴侣。(n)

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet (S2)
杰夫博士：落基山兽医 (S2)
programme.desc: After 25 years in a tiny clinic, the team are moving to a brand new clinic with twice the space to help animals in need.(n)
在一家小诊所工作 25 年后，该团队将搬到一家全新的诊所，其空间是原来的两倍，以帮助有需要的动物。(n)

programme.title: Saving Britain's Wildlife (S1)
拯救英国野生动物（S1）
programme.desc: A breakout of deadly avian botulism wipes out the population of geese on a lake, all except for one plucky survivor.(n)
致命的禽类肉毒中毒爆发，湖上的鹅群全部灭绝，只剩下一只勇敢的幸存者。(n)

programme.title: Wild Assassins (S1)
狂野刺客 (S1)
programme.desc: Masters of the sky, these airborne assassins come in all shapes and sizes.(n)
天空的主人，这些空中刺客的形状和大小各异。(n)

programme.title: Lone Star Law (S6)
孤星法则 (S6)
programme.desc: Game Wardens Mike Boone and James Noxon question a felon suspected of illegally hunting with a firearm.(n)
游戏管理员迈克·布恩和詹姆斯·诺克森对一名涉嫌使用枪支非法狩猎的重罪犯进行讯问。(n)

programme.title: Race Of Life (S1)
生命赛跑 (S1)
programme.desc: Crocodiles, like all living reptiles, have descended from animals that roamed the Earth about 250 million years ago.(n)
与所有现存的爬行动物一样，鳄鱼是大约 2.5 亿年前在地球上漫游的动物的后代。(n)

programme.title: Race Of Life (S1)
生命赛跑 (S1)
programme.desc: The hypnotic patterns of a zebra's coat and the gunshot speed of a frog help these different species succeed while defending themselves in the race of life.(n)
斑马皮毛的催眠图案和青蛙的射击速度帮助这些不同的物种在生命竞赛中保护自己并取得成功。(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees (S10)
斗牛士和假释犯 (S10)
programme.desc: Tania is shocked by what she finds once she gets a stray dog back to the rescue. An empty nester brings her family to Villalobos to help her find a companion.(n)
当塔尼亚救回一只流浪狗时，她对所发现的一切感到震惊。 一名空巢老人带着家人来到维拉洛博斯帮助她寻找伴侣。(n)

programme.title: Wildlife 24
野生动物 24
programme.desc: 24 hours doesn't seem very long but in just one day our world sees huge changes, endless beauty and constant drama.(n)
24小时看似很长，但在短短的一天里，我们的世界发生了巨大的变化，无尽的美丽和不断的戏剧。(n)

programme.title: Lions & Hyenas
狮子和鬣狗
programme.desc: For thousands of years, lions and hyenas have competed hard for meat. They share the same territory, however, their survival strategies are antagonistic.(n)
几千年来，狮子和鬣狗为了肉食而展开了激烈的竞争。 它们共享同一领地，但生存策略却是对立的。(n)

programme.title: My Cat From Hell (S9)
我的地狱猫 (S9)
programme.desc: Jackson meets an outdoor cat named Henery, who has protested by soaking the house in pee. A desperate foster guardian resorts to Jackson as her only hope to save a cat.(n)
杰克逊遇到了一只名叫亨利的户外猫，它用尿液浸泡房子来抗议。 绝望的寄养监护人求助于杰克逊，以此作为拯救一只猫的唯一希望。(n)

programme.title: Meet The Penguins (S1)
认识企鹅 (S1)
programme.desc: The staff battle to save a vulnerable chick, a portly penguin is put on a strict diet, and in home pen a juvenile of unknown gender gets some important test results.(n)
工作人员奋力拯救一只脆弱的小企鹅，一只肥胖的企鹅被严格控制饮食，而在家里，一只性别不明的幼年企鹅得到了一些重要的测试结果。(n)

programme.title: Meet The Sloths (S1)
认识树懒 (S1)
programme.desc: Scientist Becky tries to find out what drives the females of the species wild. Meanwhile, young Choloepus, Tigger, starts to display un-slothlike tendencies.(n)
科学家贝基试图找出是什么驱使该物种的雌性变得野生。 与此同时，年轻的Choloepus，跳跳虎，开始表现出不像树懒的倾向。(n)

programme.title: Wild Winter (S1)
狂野的冬天（S1）
programme.desc: Animals have adapted to survive the hard winter conditions to ensure the future of their species.(n)
动物已经适应了严酷的冬季条件，以确保其物种的未来。(n)

programme.title: Hot Life Africa (S1)
非洲热生活 (S1)
programme.desc: Most species that live in extreme places are delaying their life cycles of reproduction and breeding.(n)
大多数生活在极端地区的物种正在推迟其繁殖和繁殖的生命周期。(n)

programme.title: Race Of Life (S1)
生命赛跑 (S1)
programme.desc: Crocodiles, like all living reptiles, have descended from animals that roamed the Earth about 250 million years ago.(n)
与所有现存的爬行动物一样，鳄鱼是大约 2.5 亿年前在地球上漫游的动物的后代。(n)

programme.title: Race Of Life (S1)
生命赛跑 (S1)
programme.desc: The hypnotic patterns of a zebra's coat and the gunshot speed of a frog help these different species succeed while defending themselves in the race of life.(n)
斑马皮毛的催眠图案和青蛙的射击速度帮助这些不同的物种在生命竞赛中保护自己并取得成功。(n)

programme.title: My Cat From Hell (S9)
我的地狱猫 (S9)
programme.desc: Jackson meets an outdoor cat named Henery, who has protested by soaking the house in pee. A desperate foster guardian resorts to Jackson as her only hope to save a cat.(n)
杰克逊遇到了一只名叫亨利的户外猫，它用尿液浸泡房子来抗议。 绝望的寄养监护人求助于杰克逊，以此作为拯救一只猫的唯一希望。(n)

programme.title: Wild Dynasties (S1)
狂野王朝 (S1)
programme.desc: Raising the young is no easy task, but out in the wild, the threats to vulnerable youngsters are endless.(n)
抚养幼崽并不是一件容易的事，但在野外，脆弱的幼崽所面临的威胁是无穷无尽的。(n)

programme.title: Super Animals (S1)
超级动物（S1）
programme.desc: In the episode, we'll reveal how the ostrich attains its super speed, how the polar bear survives the coldest places on Earth.(n)
在这一集中，我们将揭示鸵鸟如何获得超高速，北极熊如何在地球上最寒冷的地方生存。(n)

programme.title: Super Animals (S1)
超级动物（S1）
programme.desc: Super animals reveals the fantastic and amazing creatures that inhabit our planet.(n)
超级动物揭示了居住在我们星球上的奇妙而令人惊奇的生物。(n)

programme.title: Wildlife 24
野生动物 24
programme.desc: 24 hours doesn't seem very long but in just one day our world sees huge changes, endless beauty and constant drama.(n)

programme.title: Mountain Monsters (S5)
山怪 (S5)
programme.desc: The AIMS team finds a decades-old clue etched in stone by late team leader Trapper, leading to a shocking revelation about No Man's Land.(n)
AIMS 团队发现了一条由已故团队领导特拉珀刻在石头上的数十年前的线索，从而揭开了关于无人区的令人震惊的真相。(n)

programme.title: Mountain Monsters (S5)
山怪 (S5)

AIMS 团队发现了一条由已故团队领导特拉珀刻在石头上的数十年前的线索，从而揭开了关于无人区的令人震惊的真相。(n)

programme.title: Super Animals (S1)
超级动物（S1）

在这一集中，我们将揭示鸵鸟如何获得超高速，北极熊如何在地球上最寒冷的地方生存。(n)

programme.title: Super Animals (S1)
超级动物（S1）

programme.title: My Cat From Hell (S9)
我的地狱猫 (S9)
programme.desc: Jackson faces the highest stakes of the series when he experiences the vicious claws of a troubled cat who's terrorizing a family about to bring home a newborn baby.(n)
当杰克逊遇到一只陷入困境的猫的恶毒爪子时，他面临着该系列中最高的风险，这只猫正在恐吓一个即将带新生儿回家的家庭。(n)

programme.title: Wild Assassins (S1)
狂野刺客 (S1)
programme.desc: To master the art of disguise for many is an impossible feat but, for these universal soldiers, it's the weapon that makes them experts at hunting and hiding.(n)
对于许多人来说，掌握伪装艺术是一项不可能完成的任务，但对于这些全能士兵来说，正是这种武器使他们成为狩猎和隐藏方面的专家。(n)

在 Covid-19 之后，疾病和感染对世界的影响比以往任何时候都更加明显。(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees (S10)
斗牛士和假释犯 (S10)
programme.desc: Lizzy tries to track down the owner of a dog tied up outside the rescue. An older couple comes looking for their first dog.(n)
丽兹试图找到一只被绑在救援机构外的狗的主人。 一对年长的夫妇来寻找他们的第一只狗。(n)

programme.title: My Cat From Hell China (S1)
我的地狱猫 (S1)
programme.desc: Wang Bingyang and Lu Yan have been waking up to nightly fights between their three cats Bread, Butter and Meatball.(n)
王丙阳和陆岩每晚都被他们的三只猫面包、黄油和肉丸打架吵醒。(n)

programme.title: Tanked (S5)
坦克 (S5)
programme.desc: A call from NBA star Dwight Howard sends Brett and Wayde to Houston. But Howard doesn't just want a fish tank, he also wants a new habitat for his two snakes!(n)
NBA 球星德怀特·霍华德打来电话，让布雷特和韦德前往休斯顿。 但霍华德不仅仅想要一个鱼缸，他还想要为他的两条蛇提供一个新的栖息地！(n)

programme.title: Crikey! It's The Irwins (S3)
克里克！ 这是欧文 (S3)
programme.desc: After the birth of Talbert the giraffe, complications arise and the Irwins worry for his life. Robert rescues an entangled black swan caught in fishing line.(n)
长颈鹿塔尔伯特出生后，出现了并发症，欧文夫妇担心他的生命。 罗伯特救了一只被鱼线缠住的黑天鹅。(n)

programme.title: Zambia Untamed (S1)
狂野赞比亚 (S1)
programme.desc: In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But there are dangers here as the resident leopard is powerful.(n)
卢安瓜山谷中有一片乌木树林，是一群狒狒的家园。 但这里也存在危险，因为这里的豹子很强大。(n)

programme.title: Extinct Or Alive: The Lost Shark
灭绝还是活着：迷失的鲨鱼
programme.desc: Forrest Galante heads to the Maldives to find a supposedly extinct shark. Unidentified sharks in the area have led many to believe it's alive.(n)
福雷斯特·加兰特前往马尔代夫寻找一种据称已经灭绝的鲨鱼。 该地区出现的身份不明的鲨鱼让许多人相信它还活着。(n)

programme.title: Wild Winter (S1)
狂野的冬天（S1）
programme.desc: Animals have adapted to survive the hard winter conditions to ensure the future of their species.(n)
动物已经适应了严酷的冬季条件，以确保其物种的未来。(n)

programme.title: Meet The Penguins (S1)
认识企鹅 (S1)
programme.desc: The staff battle to save a vulnerable chick, a portly penguin is put on a strict diet, and in home pen a juvenile of unknown gender gets some important test results.(n)
工作人员奋力拯救一只脆弱的小企鹅，一只肥胖的企鹅被严格控制饮食，而在家里，一只性别不明的幼年企鹅得到了一些重要的测试结果。(n)

programme.title: Meet The Sloths (S1)
认识树懒 (S1)
programme.desc: Scientist Becky tries to find out what drives the females of the species wild. Meanwhile, young Choloepus, Tigger, starts to display un-slothlike tendencies.(n)
科学家贝基试图找出是什么驱使该物种的雌性变得野生。 与此同时，年轻的Choloepus，跳跳虎，开始表现出不像树懒的倾向。(n)

programme.title: Wild Wild Bunch (S1)
狂野群 (S1)
programme.desc: Sometimes, it takes the merest of expressions for everyone to know that trouble is on its way. And some murderers can look both terrifying and gorgeous at the same time!(n)
有时，只需一个表情，每个人都知道麻烦即将来临。 有些凶手看起来既可怕又华丽！(n)

极限蛇 (S1)
programme.desc: This is the story of how Australia's snakes evolved, over millions of years, to thrive and become dominant predators in every ecosystem.(n)
这是澳大利亚蛇如何在数百万年的进化过程中茁壮成长并成为每个生态系统中的主要掠食者的故事。(n)

programme.title: Meet The Penguins (S1)
认识企鹅 (S1)
programme.desc: Cedric's happy marriage to wife Robin faces its biggest challenge,Squeaker the juvenile tests people's patience and a wild penguin comes in with a life-threatening wound.(n)
塞德里克与妻子罗宾的幸福婚姻面临着最大的挑战，少年吱吱考验着人们的耐心，一只带着危及生命的伤口的野生企鹅进来了。

programme.title: Meet The Sloths (S1)
认识树懒 (S1)
programme.desc: It's touch-and-go when sanctuary lothario, Randy, succumbs to an infection, a new arrival gets a presidential welcome and Becky reveals the secrets of sloth attraction.(n)
当庇护所懒鬼兰迪死于感染、新来的人受到总统的欢迎以及贝基揭示树懒吸引的秘密时，一切都一触即发。(n)

programme.title: Wild Assassins (S1)
狂野刺客 (S1)
programme.desc: Mighty elephants of the wild are one of the many animals to use their evolutionary weapons to their advantage.(n)

programme.title: Crikey! It's The Irwins (S3)
克里克！ 这是欧文 (S3)
programme.desc: Terri and Bindi join the team at The Australia Zoo Wildlife Hospital as they treat an incredible range of animals.(n)
Terri 和 Bindi 加入澳大利亚动物园野生动物医院的团队，治疗种类繁多的动物。(n)

programme.title: Zambia Untamed (S1)
狂野赞比亚 (S1)
programme.desc: The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out.(n)
卢安瓜山谷的平原和林地是所有地区中最狂野、最无情的地方，掠食者与猎物之间的决斗在这里上演。(n)

programme.title: The Zoo Specials (S5)
动物园特价 (S5)
programme.desc: It takes creativity and care to feed more than 6,000 zoo animals every day. An Andean condor's meal comes with a challenge.(n)
每天喂养 6,000 多只动物园动物需要创造力和细心。 安第斯秃鹰的膳食充满挑战。(n)

programme.title: Race Of Life (S1)
生命赛跑 (S1)
programme.desc: Crocodiles, like all living reptiles, have descended from animals that roamed the Earth about 250 million years ago.(n)
与所有现存的爬行动物一样，鳄鱼是大约 2.5 亿年前在地球上漫游的动物的后代。(n)

programme.title: Race Of Life (S1)
生命赛跑 (S1)
programme.desc: The hypnotic patterns of a zebra's coat and the gunshot speed of a frog help these different species succeed while defending themselves in the race of life.(n)
斑马皮毛的催眠图案和青蛙的射击速度帮助这些不同的物种在生命竞赛中保护自己并取得成功。(n)

programme.title: Lone Star Law (S6)
孤星法则 (S6)
programme.desc: Game Wardens Mike Boone and James Noxon question a felon suspected of illegally hunting with a firearm.(n)
游戏管理员迈克·布恩和詹姆斯·诺克森对一名涉嫌使用枪支非法狩猎的重罪犯进行讯问。(n)

生命赛跑 (S1)
programme.desc: Ocean critters have evolved over time to survive by adapting to their habitat.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Snakes (S1)
极限蛇 (S1)
programme.desc: This is the story of how Australia's snakes evolved, over millions of years, to thrive and become dominant predators in every ecosystem.(n)
这是澳大利亚蛇如何在数百万年的进化过程中茁壮成长并成为每个生态系统中的主要掠食者的故事。(n)

programme.title: Lone Star Law (S6)
孤星法则 (S6)
programme.desc: Game Wardens Morgan Inman and Justin Eddins interrogate a group of hunters suspected of trespassing and theft.(n)
游戏管理员摩根·英曼和贾斯汀·埃丁斯审问一群涉嫌非法侵入和盗窃的猎人。(n)

programme.title: Wild Assassins (S1)
狂野刺客 (S1)
programme.desc: Masters of the sky, these airborne assassins come in all shapes and sizes.(n)
天空的主人，这些空中刺客的形状和大小各异。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Akane perfectly impersonate Ai, uncovering her hidden child, which piques Aqua's strong interest in her.(n)
茜完美地模仿了小爱，发现了她隐藏的孩子，这激起了阿克娅对她的浓厚兴趣。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Memcho, a promising new member of B Komachi with idol dreams, has a secret despite her popularity and no contractual issues.(n)
拥有偶像梦想的 B 小町新成员 Memcho 尽管人气很高，而且没有合同问题，但她却有一个秘密。(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: Iori and Kohei attend class in their underwear like normal, but everyone glares at them with a bloodthirsty look in their eyes! It's because they heard that Iori and Chisa are dating! Sensing their lives are in danger, Iori and Kohei offer to setup a mixer. They ask Azusa to introduce her friends, but she brings Aina Yoshiwara, the "Cakey" girl from the Izu Spring Festival!(n)
伊织和航平像往常一样穿着内衣上课，但所有人都用嗜血的目光瞪着他们！ 因为他们听说伊织和千纱正在交往！ 伊织和航平意识到自己的生命处于危险之中，主动提出安装一台混音器。 他们让梓介绍她的朋友，结果她带来了伊豆春节的“蛋糕”女孩吉原爱菜！(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: Iori and Kohei get through their exams by cheating. Meanwhile, PaB throws a welcome party for Aina, their new member. Aina was looking forward to getting a new start to college life, but discovers that no one in the club is normal! Nevertheless, the club members are serious about diving and have the new members learn basic hand signals and dive in pairs. However, Iori gets paired up with Chisa.(n)
伊织和航平通过作弊通过了考试。 与此同时，PaB 为新成员艾娜举办了欢迎派对。 艾娜期待着大学生活的新开始，却发现社团里没有一个人是正常人！ 尽管如此，俱乐部成员对潜水很认真，并让新成员学习基本的手势并两人一组潜水。 然而，八神与千纱配对。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Noah is revived to fight Kanda once more. Draining more of his life, Kanda restores Mugen momentarily and finally destroys Skin.(n)
诺亚复活并再次与神田战斗。 神田耗尽了更多的生命，暂时恢复了无限，并最终摧毁了皮肤。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: After Skin's death, the Noah twins set several traps for Allen, who managed to beat these challenges through his experiences with General Cross.(n)
斯金死后，诺亚双胞胎为艾伦设置了多个陷阱，艾伦通过与克罗斯将军的经历成功克服了这些挑战。

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Akane perfectly impersonate Ai, uncovering her hidden child, which piques Aqua's strong interest in her.(n)
茜完美地模仿了小爱，发现了她隐藏的孩子，这激起了阿克娅对她的浓厚兴趣。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: Raeliana wakes up in Noah's bed and sees him naked. She runs away and disguises herself as a maid in the mansion.(n)
雷利安娜在诺亚的床上醒来，看到他赤身裸体。 她逃跑了，伪装成宅邸中的女仆。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.(n)
在狩猎怪物之前，女性有向男性递手帕的习俗。 那天诺亚向雷利安娜提出了请求。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Lero kidnaps Lenalee, and the Exorcists follow them into the portal, only to see the infamous Noah's Ark in the sky before being attacked by Akuma.(n)
莱罗绑架了莱娜莉，驱魔人跟随他们进入传送门，却看到了臭名昭著的诺亚方舟在天空中，然后遭到阿库玛的攻击。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Kanda tells the others to go without him while he fights the Noah and Skin Bolic. In Edo, Marie and Tiedoll continue fighting the combined Akuma.(n)
神田告诉其他人在他与诺亚和斯金博利克战斗时不要带他。 在江户，玛丽和蒂多尔继续与阿库玛联合作战。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Kanda activates his Kinki Sangenshiki when the room is near collapse, and Kanda unleashes a final attack on Skin but fails to kill Skin.(n)
当房间接近崩溃时，神田激活了他的近畿三元式，神田对皮肤发动了最后的攻击，但未能杀死皮肤。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Noah is revived to fight Kanda once more. Draining more of his life, Kanda restores Mugen momentarily and finally destroys Skin.(n)

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan
我的鹿朋友Nokotan
programme.desc: Koshitan, the student council president, faces challenges during Hinominami High's sports festival. Will they succeed?(n)
学生会主席甲志丹在日之南高中的体育祭中面临挑战。 他们会成功吗？(n)

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan
我的鹿朋友Nokotan
programme.desc: Koshitan finds Nokotan in tears at the clubhouse, but it's just hay fever. Now Nokotan looks for ways to cope!(n)
Koshitan 在俱乐部会所发现 Nokotan 流着泪，但这只是花粉症。 现在Nokotan正在寻找应对方法！(n)

programme.title: MY DEER FRIEND NOKOTAN
我的鹿朋友诺科坦
programme.desc: Nokotan feels the "hunter's aura" of legendary Kumatori at Hinominami High. She'll do anything to escape, but what fate awaits her?(n)
野古丹在日之南高中感受到了传说中的熊取的“猎人的光环”。 她会不择手段地逃脱，但等待着她的命运是什么？(n)

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan
我的鹿朋友Nokotan
programme.desc: In the finale, "Farewell Nokotan!? Long Live the Deer Club!", Koshitan and viewers face the challenge of Nokotan's sudden disappearance.(n)
在大结局“再见Nokotan！？鹿俱乐部万岁！”中，Koshitan 和观众面临Nokotan 突然失踪的挑战。(n)

programme.title: THE DAILY LIFE OF A MIDDLE-AGED ONLINE SHOPPER IN ANOTHER WORLD
另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi holds a barbecue party, Primura proposes to sell the dishes he makes. However, some customers harass them...(n)
健一举办烧烤派对，普莉村提议出售他做的菜肴。 然而，有些顾客骚扰他们...(n)

programme.title: THE DAILY LIFE OF A MIDDLE-AGED ONLINE SHOPPER IN ANOTHER WORLD
另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi goes to the dungeon Myare discovered and finds a lot of crystals, but a giant cave spider suddenly appears.(n)
健一前往迈亚雷发现的地牢，发现了大量的水晶，但突然出现了一只巨大的洞穴蜘蛛。(n)

programme.title: THE DAILY LIFE OF A MIDDLE-AGED ONLINE SHOPPER IN ANOTHER WORLD
另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi takes over the construction of the canal, but it's hard to finish on time when the forest hasn't been cleared.(n)
健一接管了运河的建设，但由于森林尚未被砍伐，很难按时完成。(n)

另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi holds a barbecue party, Primura proposes to sell the dishes he makes. However, some customers harass them...(n)
健一举办烧烤派对，普莉村提议出售他做的菜肴。 然而，有些顾客骚扰他们...(n)

programme.title: THE DAILY LIFE OF A MIDDLE-AGED ONLINE SHOPPER IN ANOTHER WORLD
另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi goes to the dungeon Myare discovered and finds a lot of crystals, but a giant cave spider suddenly appears.(n)
健一前往迈亚雷发现的地牢，发现了大量的水晶，但突然出现了一只巨大的洞穴蜘蛛。(n)

programme.title: THE DAILY LIFE OF A MIDDLE-AGED ONLINE SHOPPER IN ANOTHER WORLD
另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi takes over the construction of the canal, but it's hard to finish on time when the forest hasn't been cleared.(n)
健一接管了运河的建设，但由于森林尚未被砍伐，很难按时完成。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: Raeliana wakes up in Noah's bed and sees him naked. She runs away and disguises herself as a maid in the mansion.(n)
雷利安娜在诺亚的床上醒来，看到他赤身裸体。 她逃跑了，伪装成宅邸中的女仆。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.(n)
在狩猎怪物之前，女性有向男性递手帕的习俗。 那天诺亚向雷利安娜提出了请求。(n)

programme.title: WITCH WATCH
女巫手表
programme.desc: Morihito Otogi, a high schooler with ogre powers, ends up living with his childhood friend Nico, a witch-in-training.(n)
拥有食人魔力量的高中生大木守仁最终与他儿时的朋友、受训女巫妮可住在一起。(n)

《幽灵》第二季
programme.desc: Kotoko finds out the real murderer. Muroi is able to get rid of the accusation but he has to face a cruel truth.(n)
琴子查出了真正的凶手。 室井能够摆脱指控，但他必须面对残酷的事实。(n)

programme.title: IN/SPECTRE SEASON 2
《幽灵》第二季
programme.desc: Rikka moves out from Kotoko and Kuro. As she doesn't have any guarantor, she rents a room that has a grisly history.(n)
六花从琴子和黑中搬出。 由于没有任何担保人，她租了一间有着可怕历史的房间。(n)

programme.title: IN/SPECTRE SEASON 2
《幽灵》第二季
programme.desc: Tae is living with a yokai cat. Fishermen in her seaside town find dead fish coming in with the tide every morning.(n)
泰和一只妖怪猫住在一起。 每天早上，海边小镇的渔民都会发现死鱼随着潮水涌来。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Actress Akane struggles to stand out in "Now Gachi," acting out but failing to get the desired response, leading to growing anxiety.(n)
女演员朱在《Now Gachi》中努力脱颖而出，但未能得到预期的回应，导致焦虑日益加剧。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Aqua saves Akane from a dangerous situation, and she decides to continue the show. Aqua then works to dispel the biases against her.(n)
阿克娅将茜从危险的境地中救了出来，她决定继续演出。 阿克娅随后努力消除对她的偏见。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Akane perfectly impersonate Ai, uncovering her hidden child, which piques Aqua's strong interest in her.(n)
茜完美地模仿了小爱，发现了她隐藏的孩子，这激起了阿克娅对她的浓厚兴趣。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Memcho, a promising new member of B Komachi with idol dreams, has a secret despite her popularity and no contractual issues.(n)
拥有偶像梦想的 B 小町新成员 Memcho 尽管人气很高，而且没有合同问题，但她却有一个秘密。(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: The Izu Spring Festival has begun! The members of Peek-a-Boo run an okonomiyaki stall with Iori, Kohei, Chisa, and Azusa helping out. Iori finds himself in a complicated situation when a misunderstanding with Azusa occurs and a rivalry with the tennis club Tinkerbell begins. When Chisa gets nervous and freezes up during the women's beauty pageant, Iori and Kohei think of a plan to cheer her on.(n)
伊豆春节开始了！ Peek-a-Boo 成员在伊织、耕平、千纱和梓的帮助下经营御好烧摊位。 伊织发现自己陷入了复杂的境地，与梓产生了误会，并与网球俱乐部小叮当展开了竞争。 当千纱在女子选美比赛中变得紧张并僵住时，伊织和晃平想到了一个为她加油的计划。(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: Iori and Kohei attend class in their underwear like normal, but everyone glares at them with a bloodthirsty look in their eyes! It's because they heard that Iori and Chisa are dating! Sensing their lives are in danger, Iori and Kohei offer to setup a mixer. They ask Azusa to introduce her friends, but she brings Aina Yoshiwara, the "Cakey" girl from the Izu Spring Festival!(n)
伊织和航平像往常一样穿着内衣上课，但所有人都用嗜血的目光瞪着他们！ 因为他们听说伊织和千纱正在交往！ 伊织和航平意识到自己的生命处于危险之中，主动提出安装一台混音器。 他们让梓介绍她的朋友，结果她带来了伊豆春节的“蛋糕”女孩吉原爱菜！(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: Iori and Kohei get through their exams by cheating. Meanwhile, PaB throws a welcome party for Aina, their new member. Aina was looking forward to getting a new start to college life, but discovers that no one in the club is normal! Nevertheless, the club members are serious about diving and have the new members learn basic hand signals and dive in pairs. However, Iori gets paired up with Chisa.(n)
伊织和航平通过作弊通过了考试。 与此同时，PaB 为新成员艾娜举办了欢迎派对。 艾娜期待着大学生活的新开始，却发现社团里没有一个人是正常人！ 尽管如此，俱乐部成员对潜水很认真，并让新成员学习基本的手势并两人一组潜水。 然而，八神与千纱配对。(n)

伊织和航平通过作弊通过了考试。 与此同时，PaB 为新成员艾娜举办了欢迎派对。 艾娜期待着大学生活的新开始，却发现社团里没有一个人是正常人！ 尽管如此，俱乐部成员对潜水很认真，并让新成员学习基本的手势并两人一组潜水。 然而，八神与千纱配对。(n)

programme.title: THE DAILY LIFE OF A MIDDLE-AGED ONLINE SHOPPER IN ANOTHER WORLD
另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi holds a barbecue party, Primura proposes to sell the dishes he makes. However, some customers harass them...(n)
健一举办烧烤派对，普莉村提议出售他做的菜肴。 然而，有些顾客骚扰他们...(n)

programme.title: THE DAILY LIFE OF A MIDDLE-AGED ONLINE SHOPPER IN ANOTHER WORLD
另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi goes to the dungeon Myare discovered and finds a lot of crystals, but a giant cave spider suddenly appears.(n)
健一前往迈亚雷发现的地牢，发现了大量的水晶，但突然出现了一只巨大的洞穴蜘蛛。(n)

programme.title: THE DAILY LIFE OF A MIDDLE-AGED ONLINE SHOPPER IN ANOTHER WORLD
另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活
programme.desc: Kenichi takes over the construction of the canal, but it's hard to finish on time when the forest hasn't been cleared.(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Noah is revived to fight Kanda once more. Draining more of his life, Kanda restores Mugen momentarily and finally destroys Skin.(n)
诺亚复活并再次与神田战斗。 神田耗尽了更多的生命，暂时恢复了无限，并最终摧毁了皮肤。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: After Skin's death, the Noah twins set several traps for Allen, who managed to beat these challenges through his experiences with General Cross.(n)
斯金死后，诺亚双胞胎为艾伦设置了多个陷阱，艾伦通过与克罗斯将军的经历成功克服了这些挑战。

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: Raeliana wakes up in Noah's bed and sees him naked. She runs away and disguises herself as a maid in the mansion.(n)
雷利安娜在诺亚的床上醒来，看到他赤身裸体。 她逃跑了，伪装成宅邸中的女仆。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.(n)
在狩猎怪物之前，女性有向男性递手帕的习俗。 那天诺亚向雷利安娜提出了请求。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Akane perfectly impersonate Ai, uncovering her hidden child, which piques Aqua's strong interest in her.(n)
茜完美地模仿了小爱，发现了她隐藏的孩子，这激起了阿克娅对她的浓厚兴趣。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: Memcho, a promising new member of B Komachi with idol dreams, has a secret despite her popularity and no contractual issues.(n)

远方圣骑士
programme.desc: Will turns 15 years old. For his coming-of-age ceremony, he has to duel with Blood.(n)
威尔 15 岁了。 为了成人礼，他必须与血决斗。(n)

programme.title: THE FARAWAY PALADIN
远方圣骑士
programme.desc: The God of Undeath suddenly appears and tries to take away Blood and Mary. Gus later repels and rescues them.(n)
不死之神突然出现并试图夺走血和玛丽。 格斯后来击退并营救了他们。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)

艾伦在利威尔和克罗里的帮助下成功抓住了双胞胎。 双胞胎合并并显露出他们的真实形态。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Krory fights Jasdevi alone and holds on by drinking Chomesuke's blood. However, with Krory weakened, Jasdevi encloses him inside an iron maiden.(n)
克罗里独自与贾斯德维战斗，并通过喝 Chomesuke 的血坚持了下来。 然而，随着 Krory 的虚弱，Jasdevi 将他封入铁处女体内。(n)

另一个世界中年网购者的日常生活

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: Iori and Kohei get through their exams by cheating. Meanwhile, PaB throws a welcome party for Aina, their new member. Aina was looking forward to getting a new start to college life, but discovers that no one in the club is normal! Nevertheless, the club members are serious about diving and have the new members learn basic hand signals and dive in pairs. However, Iori gets paired up with Chisa.(n)
伊织和航平通过作弊通过了考试。 与此同时，PaB 为新成员艾娜举办了欢迎派对。 艾娜期待着大学生活的新开始，却发现社团里没有一个人是正常人！ 尽管如此，俱乐部成员对潜水很认真，并让新成员学习基本的手势并两人一组潜水。 然而，八神与千纱配对。(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: Iori and the others dream about going diving at a beautiful location after seeing an article on Miyakojima in a magazine. However, Tokita and Kotobuki decide the club is going to join a tennis doubles match! They explain that they're joining the match to get everyone to build trust with their diving buddy, but the real reason is to get back at the tennis club and take away their prize money!(n)
伊织等人在杂志上看到有关宫古岛的文章后，梦想着去一个美丽的地方潜水。 然而，时田和寿决定俱乐部要参加网球双打比赛！ 他们解释说，他们参加比赛是为了让每个人与他们的跳水伙伴建立信任，但真正的原因是回到网球俱乐部并拿走他们的奖金！(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)

克罗里的血液离开了他的身体，并以他的纯真创造的一种名为“血腥克罗里”的形式攻击贾斯德维，导致贾斯德维闯入了双胞胎。

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.(n)
在狩猎怪物之前，女性有向男性递手帕的习俗。 那天诺亚向雷利安娜提出了请求。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: Noah offers Raeliana the monster he killed. Someone approaches Vivian when her hatred for Raeliana gets more intense.(n)
诺亚向雷利安娜提供了他杀死的怪物。 当薇薇安对雷利安娜的仇恨变得更加强烈时，有人接近她。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: B-Komachi is set for Japan Idol Fest but must decide who will be the center, with Ruby and Memcho pushing for Kana, the best singer.(n)
B-Komachi 即将参加日本偶像节，但必须决定谁将成为中心，Ruby 和 Memcho 力争最好的歌手 Kana。(n)

programme.title: OSHI NO KO
押之子
programme.desc: B Komachi takes the stage, with Ruby charming fans like the late Ai, but Kana lacks support as the crowd cheers for Memcho.(n)
B Komachi 登上舞台，Ruby 吸引了已故 Ai 等粉丝，但当观众为 Memcho 欢呼时，Kana 却缺乏支持。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.(n)
在狩猎怪物之前，女性有向男性递手帕的习俗。 那天诺亚向雷利安娜提出了请求。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: Noah offers Raeliana the monster he killed. Someone approaches Vivian when her hatred for Raeliana gets more intense.(n)
诺亚向雷利安娜提供了他杀死的怪物。 当薇薇安对雷利安娜的仇恨变得更加强烈时，有人接近她。(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: Iori and the others dream about going diving at a beautiful location after seeing an article on Miyakojima in a magazine. However, Tokita and Kotobuki decide the club is going to join a tennis doubles match! They explain that they're joining the match to get everyone to build trust with their diving buddy, but the real reason is to get back at the tennis club and take away their prize money!(n)
伊织等人在杂志上看到有关宫古岛的文章后，梦想着去一个美丽的地方潜水。 然而，时田和寿决定俱乐部要参加网球双打比赛！ 他们解释说，他们参加比赛是为了让每个人与他们的跳水伙伴建立信任，但真正的原因是回到网球俱乐部并拿走他们的奖金！(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: The members of the diving team start working part-time jobs to pay for their trip to Okinawa. However, Iori and Kohei end up spending all their earnings on drinking. Meanwhile, Kotobuki is working hard as a bartender, and his boss lets Iori and Kohei try it out too. However, these two idiots don't know how to make cocktails, and end up creating some dangerous new drinks!(n)
跳水队的成员开始打工来支付冲绳之旅的费用。 然而，伊织和耕平最终把所有的收入都花在了喝酒上。 与此同时，寿正在努力担任调酒师，他的老板也让伊织和航平也尝试一下。 然而，这两个白痴不知道如何制作鸡尾酒，最终创造出了一些危险的新饮料！(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Krory fights Jasdevi alone and holds on by drinking Chomesuke's blood. However, with Krory weakened, Jasdevi encloses him inside an iron maiden.(n)
克罗里独自与贾斯德维战斗，并通过喝 Chomesuke 的血坚持了下来。 然而，随着 Krory 的虚弱，Jasdevi 将他封入铁处女体内。(n)

programme.title: D.GRAY-MAN (#53-103)
D.灰人 (#53-103)
programme.desc: Krory's blood leaves his body and attacks Jasdevi in a form created by his Innocence called "Bloody Krory", causing Jasdevi to break into the twins.(n)
克罗里的血液离开了他的身体，并以他的纯真创造的一种名为“血腥克罗里”的形式攻击贾斯德维，导致贾斯德维闯入了双胞胎。

OSHI NO KO（新 Eps）

programme.title: OSHI NO KO (New Eps)

为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: Raeliana rescues a bird in front of High Priest Heika, who says it is destined to die. They end up having an argument.(n)
雷利安娜在高阶祭司海卡面前救了一只鸟，海卡说这只鸟注定要死。 他们最终发生了争执。(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: The members of the diving team start working part-time jobs to pay for their trip to Okinawa. However, Iori and Kohei end up spending all their earnings on drinking. Meanwhile, Kotobuki is working hard as a bartender, and his boss lets Iori and Kohei try it out too. However, these two idiots don't know how to make cocktails, and end up creating some dangerous new drinks!(n)
跳水队的成员开始打工来支付冲绳之旅的费用。 然而，伊织和耕平最终把所有的收入都花在了喝酒上。 与此同时，寿正在努力担任调酒师，他的老板也让伊织和航平也尝试一下。 然而，这两个白痴不知道如何制作鸡尾酒，最终创造出了一些危险的新饮料！(n)

programme.title: GRAND BLUE
碧海蓝天
programme.desc: Iori tries to setup another mixer for his friends, and wants to ask Chisa to introduce her friends so they can all play truth or dare. Nanaka and Azusa also get involved, and they all begin a vicious game of attack and defense! However, Iori doesn't have enough money for their trip. Iori and the gang head to a diving shop to buy diving gear, but find out there's still a lot they don't know.(n)
Iori 尝试为他的朋友们设置另一个混音器，并想让 Chisa 介绍她的朋友们，以便他们都可以玩真心话大冒险。 七中和梓也卷入其中，展开了一场恶毒的攻防游戏！ 然而，伊织没有足够的钱来旅行。 伊织和伙伴们前往一家潜水店购买潜水装备，却发现还有很多他们不知道的事情。(n)

programme.title: WHY RAELIANA ENDED UP AT THE DUKE'S MANSION
为什么蕾莉安娜最终来到了公爵的宅邸
programme.desc: Noah offers Raeliana the monster he killed. Someone approaches Vivian when her hatred for Raeliana gets more intense.(n)
诺亚向雷利安娜提供了他杀死的怪物。 当薇薇安对雷利安娜的仇恨变得更加强烈时，有人接近她。(n)

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND
约定的梦幻岛
programme.desc: While Emma, Norman and Ray find out about the Morse codes hidden within some books sent by a William Minerva, Don and Gilda successfully sneak into Isabella's secret room, but….(n)
当艾玛、诺曼和雷发现威廉·密涅瓦寄来的一些书中隐藏的摩尔斯电码时，唐和吉尔达成功潜入伊莎贝拉的秘密房间，但是……(n)

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND
约定的梦幻岛
programme.desc: After Krone reveals her motive, Emma and the group decide to work with her. They try to get more information but instead, revealed that they knew how to break the tracking devices.(n)
克朗透露了她的动机后，艾玛和团队决定与她合作。 他们试图获取更多信息，但却透露他们知道如何破解跟踪设备。(n)

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
百道家的魔王
programme.desc: Unable to focus on class, Himari is asked by Nachi-sensei to clean the Literature Prep Room. There, she finds the "Peeping Mirror" that looks into the thing every person wants to know….(n)
由于无法专心上课，那智老师要求向向打扫文学准备室。 在那里，她找到了“窥视镜”，它可以窥探每个人都想知道的事情……(n)

programme.title: The Demon Prince of Momochi House
百道家的魔王
programme.desc: Himari decides to confess to Aoi, but Aoi is in a slump, causing an influx of demons in Momochi House. Grand Catmother visits and suggests matchmaking for Aoi while Himari tries to stop it.(n)
向麻里决定向葵告白，但葵却陷入了低迷，导致百道家的恶魔大量涌入。 大猫妈妈来访并建议为葵牵线搭桥，而姬玛丽则试图阻止。(n)

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
伊莉斯博士：提灯的皇家女士
programme.desc: Graham learns of Elise's true identity. When Elise visits Graham's house in attempt to reconcile, they encounter an emergency involving an unknown disease. The two geniuses join hands….(n)
格雷厄姆得知了埃莉斯的真实身份。 当埃莉斯拜访格雷厄姆的家试图和解时，他们遇到了涉及未知疾病的紧急情况。 两位天才联手……(n)

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
伊莉斯博士：提灯的皇家女士
programme.desc: Elise is staying over at the Childe household, the family she was at odds with in her past life. Julienne expresses her admiration for Elise as they both open up to each other.(n)
伊莉丝住在柴尔德家，这是她前世与她不和的一家人。 朱利安表达了她对伊莉斯的钦佩，两人互相敞开心扉。(n)

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma How to Love Your Elf Bride
大恶魔的困境 如何爱你的精灵新娘
programme.desc: Zagan and Nephy grow closer. While Zagan investigates about the demon Barbatos summoned, a sorcerer named Valefor appears. Meanwhile, Chastille is suspended from her duties.(n)
扎根和奈菲的关系越来越亲密。 当扎根调查召唤的恶魔巴巴托斯时，一位名叫维勒福的巫师出现了。 与此同时，查斯蒂尔被停职。(n)

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma How to Love Your Elf Bride
大恶魔的困境 如何爱你的精灵新娘
programme.desc: After failing her infiltration, Foll freeloads in Zagan's castle. Zagan brings her to Marchosias's castle, where they learn something new about the Archdemon seals and Twelve Holy Swords….(n)
潜入失败后，福尔在扎根的城堡里搭便车。 扎根带她来到马尔科西亚斯的城堡，在那里他们学到了一些关于大恶魔封印和十二圣剑的新知识……(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Season 6
王国第 6 季
programme.desc: Qin's next step is to conquer Zhao, but they must get through Zhao's genius strategist, Li Mu. A new strategy involving a new coalition army arises as the fierce battle for Gyou begins!(n)
秦国的下一步目标是征服赵国，但他们必须打通赵国的天才军事家李牧。 随着 Gyou 的激烈战斗开始，涉及新联军的新战略出现了！(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Season 6
王国第 6 季
programme.desc: Qin's next step is to conquer Zhao, but they must get through Zhao's genius strategist, Li Mu. A new strategy involving a new coalition army arises as the fierce battle for Gyou begins!(n)

programme.title: Tower of God
神之塔
programme.desc: As the position selection begins, and despite struggling with their assignments, the examinees grow closer. Meanwhile, someone watches them and ruminates from afar….(n)
随着职位选拔的开始，尽管考生们在作业上遇到了困难，但考生们的关系却越来越亲密。 与此同时，有人从远处看着他们并沉思……(n)

programme.title: Tower of God
神之塔
programme.desc: Several days have passed since Anaak and Endorsi's feud came to a total stop. As the next “Tag” test is about to begin, dark clouds begin gathering around Bam again.(n)
自从阿纳克和恩多尔西的不和彻底结束以来已经过去了几天。 随着下一次“标签”测试即将开始，乌云又开始聚集在巴姆周围。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: Squad 13 heads back to the Garden for testing, with Zero Two's emotional state worsening by the day.(n)
十三小队返回花园进行测试，零二的情绪日益恶化。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: Hiro and Zero Two reminisce their past lives as children in the Garden.(n)
小宏和零二在花园里回忆起他们小时候的生活。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: The information regarding Hiro's condition changes the entire dynamic of Squad 13, much to Zero Two's chagrin.(n)
有关宏病情的信息改变了 13 小队的整体动态，这让零二非常懊恼。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: The fierce battle to take the Grand Crevasse begins, and Hiro is forced to watch from the sidelines. Zero Two may have left, but Squad 13 is still concerned about the way she fights.(n)
争夺大裂缝的激烈战斗开始了，宏被迫在一旁观看。 零二虽然已经离开，但十三小队仍然担心她的战斗方式。(n)

programme.title: My New Boss is Goofy
我的新老板很傻
programme.desc: Momose and Shirosaki are at Shirosaki's hometown, Akita, for work. They end up visiting Shirosaki's home, where Shirosaki's grandmother decides to show them something unexpected….(n)
桃濑和白崎在白崎的家乡秋田工作。 他们最终参观了白崎的家，白崎的祖母决定向他们展示一些意想不到的东西……(n)

programme.title: My New Boss Is Goofy
我的新老板很傻
programme.desc: Momose and Shirosaki are at Shirosaki's hometown, Akita, for work. They end up visiting Shirosaki's home, where Shirosaki's grandmother decides to show them something unexpected….(n)

programme.title: Can a Boy-Girl Friendship Survive?
男女之间的友谊还能维持下去吗？
programme.desc: Yu, Himari and Rion discuss launching "you" as a business when Mao and Azumi drop by to order custom-made accessories. Impressed by the results, they help Yu with promoting the business.(n)
当真央和安昙顺便来订购定制配饰时，优、向向和里昂讨论推出“you”业务。 他们对结果印象深刻，帮助余推广业务。(n)

programme.title: Can a Boy-Girl Friendship Survive?
男女之间的友谊还能维持下去吗？
programme.desc: After the complaint, Sakura is involved and the issue is settled amicably, but with a condition. Himari encourages Yu to continue accessory-making, but fails. Upset, Himari makes a decision….(n)
投诉后，小樱介入，问题得到友好解决，但有条件。 Himari 鼓励 Yu 继续制作配饰，但失败了。 心烦意乱的 Himari 做出了决定……(n)

programme.title: Blue Orchestra Season 2
蓝色乐团第二季
programme.desc: After the seniors' retirement, the Orchestra Club begins preparing for the national competition with a new line-up focusing on the 2nd-years, as they struggle to achieve their ideal sound.(n)
高年级学生退役后，乐团俱乐部以二年级为主的新阵容开始备战全国比赛，为实现理想的声音而奋斗。(n)

programme.title: THE MARGINAL SERVICE

programme.title: THE MARGINAL SERVICE
边际服务
programme.desc: Brian, Zeno, Robin, and Bolts head to the Jukai, but are hit by a missile.(n)
布莱恩、芝诺、罗宾和博尔茨前往 Jukai，但被导弹击中。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: Squad 13 heads back to the Garden for testing, with Zero Two's emotional state worsening by the day.(n)
十三小队返回花园进行测试，零二的情绪日益恶化。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: Hiro and Zero Two reminisce their past lives as children in the Garden.(n)
小宏和零二在花园里回忆起他们小时候的生活。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: The information regarding Hiro's condition changes the entire dynamic of Squad 13, much to Zero Two's chagrin.(n)
有关宏病情的信息改变了 13 小队的整体动态，这让零二非常懊恼。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: The fierce battle to take the Grand Crevasse begins, and Hiro is forced to watch from the sidelines. Zero Two may have left, but Squad 13 is still concerned about the way she fights.(n)
争夺大裂缝的激烈战斗开始了，宏被迫在一旁观看。 零二虽然已经离开，但十三小队仍然担心她的战斗方式。(n)

programme.title: mono
单核细胞增多症
programme.desc: Haruno's dry-cured ham is used in a recipe, and the group sets out to buy Yatsugatake ham. Along the way, they explore abandoned place and ski areas, enjoy Kiyosato curry and visit stores.(n)
食谱中使用了春野的干腌火腿，一行人开始购买八岳火腿。 一路上，他们探索废弃的地方和滑雪场，品尝清里咖喱并参观商店。(n)

programme.title: mono
单核细胞增多症
programme.desc: For Haruno's new manga idea, the girls participate in a spherical stone-hunting event. They go around Yamanashi looking for the roundest stone with the help of a smartphone application, but….(n)
为了实现春野的新漫画想法，女孩们参加了一场球形石头狩猎活动。 他们在智能手机应用程序的帮助下绕山梨县寻找最圆的石头，但是……(n)

programme.title: Li'l Miss Vampire Can't Suck Right
吸血鬼小姐吸不准
programme.desc: Luna Ishikawa is a vampire who is popular in Ootori's class. One day, Ootori discovers her secret—the cool vampire actually sucks at sucking blood!? The new-type spoon-feeding comedy begins!(n)
石川露娜是在大鸟班上很受欢迎的吸血鬼。 有一天，大鸟发现了她的秘密——酷酷的吸血鬼竟然不擅长吸血！？ 新型喂勺喜剧开始了！(n)

programme.title: Touring After the Apocalypse
世界末日后的巡演
programme.desc: On their off-road bike, Yoko and Airi tour a post-apocalyptic Japan overflowing with nature, visiting famous spots without having to deal with traffic or rules to follow.(n)
洋子和爱理骑着越野自行车游览充满自然风光的后世界末日日本，参观著名景点，而无需处理交通问题或遵守规则。(n)

programme.title: Touring After the Apocalypse

programme.title: Isekai Quartet 3
异世界四重奏3
programme.desc: Peace returns to the school once again… or so everyone thought! Mysterious transfer students join Class 1 while strange incidents begin happening as a series of surprise events await….(n)
学校再次恢复和平……至少每个人都是这么想的！ 神秘的转校生加入一班，奇怪的事件开始发生，一系列令人惊讶的事件正在等待……(n)

programme.title: Isekai Quartet 3
异世界四重奏3
programme.desc: Peace returns to the school once again… or so everyone thought! Mysterious transfer students join Class 1 while strange incidents begin happening as a series of surprise events await….(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Season 6
王国第 6 季
programme.desc: Qin's next step is to conquer Zhao, but they must get through Zhao's genius strategist, Li Mu. A new strategy involving a new coalition army arises as the fierce battle for Gyou begins!(n)
秦国的下一步目标是征服赵国，但他们必须打通赵国的天才军事家李牧。 随着 Gyou 的激烈战斗开始，涉及新联军的新战略出现了！(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: After quashing the Empire and Soverignty's conspiracy with Alice's help, Iska and team rest at Alsamira, but go back to work upon Sisbell's request. Meanwhile, Alice gets a bad feeling….(n)
在爱丽丝的帮助下粉碎了帝国和主权的阴谋后，伊斯卡和团队在阿尔萨米拉休息，但在西斯贝尔的要求下回去工作。 与此同时，爱丽丝有一种不好的预感……(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: After bumping into Iska in Liesbaden, Alice tails him and finds out that he is in contact with Sisbell. Frustrated with their date-like rendezvous, Alice watches as they grow even closer….(n)
在利斯巴登偶遇伊斯卡后，爱丽丝跟踪他并发现他与西斯贝尔有联系。 爱丽丝对他们约会般的约会感到沮丧，看着他们变得越来越近......(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: Sisbell may be the assassin's next target as she can reenact the past. An explosion occurs near the hotel where Unit N07 hides. When Sisbell investigates, someone starts to attack her….(n)
西斯贝尔可能是刺客的下一个目标，因为她可以重演过去。 N07 部队藏身的酒店附近发生爆炸。 当西斯贝尔调查时，有人开始攻击她……(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: Alice and Millavair worry over Schwartz's disappearance. Elletear takes on the urgent task of bringing Sisbell back. Sisbell gets a fever and takes the chance to have Iska take care of her.(n)
爱丽丝和米拉维尔对施瓦茨的失踪感到担忧。 艾勒提尔承担起带回西斯贝尔的紧迫任务。 西斯贝尔发烧了，趁机让伊斯卡照顾她。(n)

programme.title: mono
单核细胞增多症
programme.desc: Haruno's dry-cured ham is used in a recipe, and the group sets out to buy Yatsugatake ham. Along the way, they explore abandoned place and ski areas, enjoy Kiyosato curry and visit stores.(n)
食谱中使用了春野的干腌火腿，一行人开始购买八岳火腿。 一路上，他们探索废弃的地方和滑雪场，品尝清里咖喱并参观商店。(n)

programme.title: mono
单核细胞增多症
programme.desc: For Haruno's new manga idea, the girls participate in a spherical stone-hunting event. They go around Yamanashi looking for the roundest stone with the help of a smartphone application, but….(n)
为了实现春野的新漫画想法，女孩们参加了一场球形石头狩猎活动。 他们在智能手机应用程序的帮助下绕山梨县寻找最圆的石头，但是……(n)

吸血鬼小姐吸不准

programme.title: Kingdom Season 6
王国第 6 季
programme.desc: Qin's next step is to conquer Zhao, but they must get through Zhao's genius strategist, Li Mu. A new strategy involving a new coalition army arises as the fierce battle for Gyou begins!(n)
秦国的下一步目标是征服赵国，但他们必须打倒赵国的天才军事家李牧。 随着 Gyou 的激烈战斗开始，涉及新联军的新战略出现了！(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: After quashing the Empire and Soverignty's conspiracy with Alice's help, Iska and team rest at Alsamira, but go back to work upon Sisbell's request. Meanwhile, Alice gets a bad feeling….(n)
在爱丽丝的帮助下粉碎了帝国和主权的阴谋后，伊斯卡和团队在阿尔萨米拉休息，但在西斯贝尔的要求下回去工作。 与此同时，爱丽丝有一种不好的预感……(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: After bumping into Iska in Liesbaden, Alice tails him and finds out that he is in contact with Sisbell. Frustrated with their date-like rendezvous, Alice watches as they grow even closer….(n)
在利斯巴登偶遇伊斯卡后，爱丽丝跟踪他并发现他与西斯贝尔有联系。 爱丽丝对他们约会般的约会感到沮丧，看着他们变得越来越近......(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: Sisbell may be the assassin's next target as she can reenact the past. An explosion occurs near the hotel where Unit N07 hides. When Sisbell investigates, someone starts to attack her….(n)
西斯贝尔可能是刺客的下一个目标，因为她可以重演过去。 N07 部队藏身的酒店附近发生爆炸。 当西斯贝尔调查时，有人开始攻击她……(n)

programme.title: HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS
HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS
programme.desc: TBH announces an Underground Division Rap Battle. Ichiro and others head to Osaka Bay and split into groups to dismantle the bombs at the theme park. Assassins appear to block their way.(n)

programme.title: HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS
HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS
programme.desc: MAD TRIGGER CREW and DOTSUITARE-HONPO arrive in a new area and fall into TBH's trap. TBH have taken three of their acquaintances captive. Out of the three, they can only choose to save one.(n)
MAD TRIGGER CREW 和 DOTSUITARE-HONPO 到达新区域并落入 TBH 的陷阱。 说实话，他们已经俘虏了他们的三名熟人。 三者中，他们只能选择拯救一个。(n)

programme.title: Mecha-Ude: Mechanical Arms
Mecha-Ude：机械臂
programme.desc: After fighting Amaryllis, Alma regains his memories and runs away. Looking for him, Hikaru goes to see Alma's older brother, Fist at ARMS HQ. Fist then reveals the past of Mecha-Udes to him.(n)
与阿玛丽利斯战斗后，阿尔玛恢复了记忆并逃跑了。 为了寻找他，光前往武器总部拜访阿尔玛的哥哥拳头。 然后拳头向他透露了 Mecha-Udes 的过去。(n)

programme.title: Mecha-Ude: Mechanical Arms
Mecha-Ude：机械臂
programme.desc: 100 years ago, Kagami Group's founder Yakumo lost his life after unsealing Ordela. Now, Kagami Group tries to use Alma to trigger Ordela's power to open the gate to the world of Mecha-Udes.(n)
100年前，加贺美集团的创始人八云在解封奥德拉后丧生。 现在，加贺美集团试图利用阿尔玛触发奥德拉的力量，打开机甲乌德斯世界的大门。(n)

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
我不是说来生要让自己的能力变得平均吗？！
programme.desc: Half a year has passed since they joined the Hunter Prep School. Reina and the girls have leveled up significantly while being dragged along Mile's common-sense-defying pace.(n)
距离他们加入猎人预科学校已经过去半年了。 雷纳和女孩们在迈尔违反常理的步伐中被拖着，进步显着。(n)

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
我不是说来生要让自己的能力变得平均吗？！
programme.desc: After graduating from hunter prep school, Mile, Reina, Mavis and Pauline formed a party named Crimson Vow. One day, the girls are ambushed by a group of bandits ….(n)
从猎人预科学校毕业后，迈尔、雷纳、梅维斯和宝琳组建了一个名为“猩红誓言”的政党。 有一天，女孩们遭到一群强盗的伏击……(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Season 6
王国第 6 季
programme.desc: Qin's next step is to conquer Zhao, but they must get through Zhao's genius strategist, Li Mu. A new strategy involving a new coalition army arises as the fierce battle for Gyou begins!(n)
秦国的下一步目标是征服赵国，但他们必须打倒赵国的天才军事家李牧。 随着 Gyou 的激烈战斗开始，涉及新联军的新战略出现了！(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Season 6
王国第 6 季
programme.desc: Qin's next step is to conquer Zhao, but they must get through Zhao's genius strategist, Li Mu. A new strategy involving a new coalition army arises as the fierce battle for Gyou begins!(n)
秦国的下一步目标是征服赵国，但他们必须打倒赵国的天才军事家李牧。 随着 Gyou 的激烈战斗开始，涉及新联军的新战略出现了！(n)

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
祭祀公主与百兽之王
programme.desc: Fenrir appeared before Sariphi and company, who were on their way to visit Porstbath, and took Sariphi away. The mastermind behind the invasion in Ozmargo turns out to be Fenrir as well.(n)
芬里尔出现在前往波斯特巴斯的萨里菲一行人面前，并带走了萨里菲。 入侵奥兹玛戈的幕后黑手原来也是芬里尔。(n)

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
祭祀公主与百兽之王
programme.desc: Lanteveldt rescues Sariphi and ends up being gravely injured by Fenrir. With Bennu unable to use his powers, the situation remains grim. Can they survive?(n)
兰特维尔特救了萨里菲，但最终被芬里尔打成重伤。 由于贝努无法使用他的力量，形势仍然严峻。 他们能活下来吗？(n)

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
祭祀公主与百兽之王
programme.desc: After the decisive battle against Fenrir, a ceremony to celebrate Leonhart's recovery awaits. On the day before, while Sariphi is upset over the broken ring, Leonhart brings her somewhere.(n)
在与芬里尔的决战之后，庆祝莱昂哈特康复的仪式正在等待着。 前一天，当萨里菲因戒指破损而心烦意乱时，莱昂哈特带她去了某个地方。(n)

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
祭祀公主与百兽之王
programme.desc: To fulfil Leonhart wish to establish diplomatic ties with Yoana, Sariphi volunteers to become an envoy. There, she encounters Ocelot, acting captain of Masqueviana's Contra Demon Knights.(n)
为了实现莱昂哈特与尤阿娜建立外交关系的愿望，萨里菲自愿成为一名特使。 在那里，她遇到了马斯奎维亚娜魂斗罗恶魔骑士团的代理队长欧斯洛特。(n)

programme.title: HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS
HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS
programme.desc: TBH announces an Underground Division Rap Battle. Ichiro and others head to Osaka Bay and split into groups to dismantle the bombs at the theme park. Assassins appear to block their way.(n)
TBH 宣布举办地下分区说唱大战。 一郎等人前往大阪湾，分成小组拆除主题公园的炸弹。 刺客似乎挡住了他们的去路。(n)

programme.title: HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS
HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS
programme.desc: MAD TRIGGER CREW and DOTSUITARE-HONPO arrive in a new area and fall into TBH's trap. TBH have taken three of their acquaintances captive. Out of the three, they can only choose to save one.(n)
MAD TRIGGER CREW 和 DOTSUITARE-HONPO 到达新区域并落入 TBH 的陷阱。 说实话，他们已经俘虏了他们的三名熟人。 三者中，他们只能选择拯救一个。(n)

programme.title: Mecha-Ude: Mechanical Arms
Mecha-Ude：机械臂
programme.desc: After fighting Amaryllis, Alma regains his memories and runs away. Looking for him, Hikaru goes to see Alma's older brother, Fist at ARMS HQ. Fist then reveals the past of Mecha-Udes to him.(n)
与阿玛丽利斯战斗后，阿尔玛恢复了记忆并逃跑了。 为了寻找他，光前往武器总部拜访阿尔玛的哥哥拳头。 然后拳头向他透露了 Mecha-Udes 的过去。(n)

programme.title: Mecha-Ude: Mechanical Arms
Mecha-Ude：机械臂
programme.desc: 100 years ago, Kagami Group's founder Yakumo lost his life after unsealing Ordela. Now, Kagami Group tries to use Alma to trigger Ordela's power to open the gate to the world of Mecha-Udes.(n)
100年前，加贺美集团的创始人八云在解封奥德拉后丧生。 现在，加贺美集团试图利用阿尔玛触发奥德拉的力量，打开机甲乌德斯世界的大门。(n)

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
我不是说来生要让自己的能力变得平均吗？！
programme.desc: Half a year has passed since they joined the Hunter Prep School. Reina and the girls have leveled up significantly while being dragged along Mile's common-sense-defying pace.(n)
距离他们加入猎人预科学校已经过去半年了。 雷纳和女孩们在迈尔违反常理的步伐中被拖着，进步显着。(n)

programme.title: mono
单核细胞增多症
programme.desc: Haruno's dry-cured ham is used in a recipe, and the group sets out to buy Yatsugatake ham. Along the way, they explore abandoned place and ski areas, enjoy Kiyosato curry and visit stores.(n)
食谱中使用了春野的干腌火腿，一行人开始购买八岳火腿。 一路上，他们探索废弃的地方和滑雪场，品尝清里咖喱并参观商店。(n)

programme.title: mono
单核细胞增多症
programme.desc: For Haruno's new manga idea, the girls participate in a spherical stone-hunting event. They go around Yamanashi looking for the roundest stone with the help of a smartphone application, but….(n)
为了实现春野的新漫画想法，女孩们参加了一场球形石头狩猎活动。 他们在智能手机应用程序的帮助下绕山梨县寻找最圆的石头，但是……(n)

programme.title: Lycoris Recoil -Friends are thieves of time.-
Lycoris Recoil -朋友是时间的小偷。-
programme.desc: Everyday Life at Café LycoReco – Part 1. The theme is "Hanami Party (Flower Viewing Party)." Script: Shingo Adachi |Storyboard & Direction: Takashi Sakuma.(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The Scouts gather for a feisty feast before leaving to retake Wall Maria to uncover what's hidden in the basement once and for all.(n)
侦察兵们聚集在一起，享用了一场热闹的盛宴，然后出发去夺回玛利亚之墙，一劳永逸地揭开地下室里隐藏的秘密。(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The Scout Regiment heads to Wall Maria in the dead of the night. Eren's breath grows erratic as the group trys to sneak past the Titans in slumber. Armin calls out to a shaking Eren….(n)
侦察兵团在夜深人静时前往玛丽亚之墙。 当一行人试图溜过沉睡中的泰坦时，艾伦的呼吸变得不稳定。 阿明向颤抖的艾伦喊道……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: A Titan swarm led by the Beast Titan has the Scout Regiment completely surrounded. While defending their warhorses, the Scout Regiment fight at full force to bring down the Armored Titan….(n)
由野兽泰坦领导的泰坦群将侦察兵团完全包围。 在保卫战马的同时，侦察兵团全力以赴击倒装甲泰坦......(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The Scout Regiment launched their latest weapon, The Thunder Spear, at the Armoured Titan. But to their horror he started to move again and roared towards the sky….(n)
侦察兵团向装甲泰坦发射了他们的最新武器“雷霆之矛”。 但令他们惊恐的是，他又开始移动，并向天空咆哮……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: Every corner is engulfed in flames and the Scout Regiment is split into two teams. Meanwhile, Erwin and Levi are attacked by a barrage of rocks launched by the Beast Titan….(n)
每个角落都被火焰吞没，侦察团分成两队。 与此同时，埃尔文和利威尔遭到了野兽泰坦发射的一系列岩石的攻击……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: Amidst the desperate situation, the Scout Regiment recruit charge towards the Beast Titan, following Erwin's lead. Meanwhile, Eren and co. have come up with another strategy….(n)
在绝望的情况下，侦察兵团新兵在埃尔文的带领下向野兽泰坦冲锋。 与此同时，艾伦和他的同事们。 已经想出了另一个策略……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: Eren stands speechless before Armin. While Eren drowns in deep sorrow, two figures appear above the wall….(n)
艾伦站在阿明面前无言以对。 当艾伦沉浸在深深的悲伤中时，墙壁上方出现了两个人影……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: Eren stands speechless before Armin. While Eren drowns in deep sorrow, two figures appear above the wall….(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The few survivors of the Scout Regiment are stationed on the walls of Shiganshina District. Meanwhile, Eren steps into the basement below his house….(n)
侦察兵团仅存的少数幸存者驻扎在石甘什纳区的城墙上。 与此同时，艾伦走进他家下面的地下室……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The memories of Eren's father, Grisha, are recorded in the book he left behind. Grisha, still a young man, was forced to face the truth of the world one day….(n)
艾伦的父亲格里沙的记忆记录在他留下的书中。 格里沙，还是个年轻人，有一天被迫面对世界的真相……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The remnants of Grisha's memories tells the story of a mission that was once entrusted to Grisha….(n)
格里沙残留的记忆讲述了曾经被托付给格里沙的一项使命的故事……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The truth behind the walls and true identity of the Titans have been revealed. After learning the truth, Historia and the leaders make a certain decision.(n)
墙后的真相和泰坦的真实身份已经被揭露。 得知真相后，希斯托利亚和领导们做出了一定的决定。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: Squad 13 heads back to the Garden for testing, with Zero Two's emotional state worsening by the day.(n)
十三小队返回花园进行测试，零二的情绪日益恶化。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: Hiro and Zero Two reminisce their past lives as children in the Garden.(n)
小宏和零二在花园里回忆起他们小时候的生活。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: The information regarding Hiro's condition changes the entire dynamic of Squad 13, much to Zero Two's chagrin.(n)
有关宏病情的信息改变了 13 小队的整体动态，这让零二非常懊恼。(n)

programme.title: DARLING in the FRANXX
法兰克斯的亲爱的
programme.desc: The fierce battle to take the Grand Crevasse begins, and Hiro is forced to watch from the sidelines. Zero Two may have left, but Squad 13 is still concerned about the way she fights.(n)
争夺大裂缝的激烈战斗开始了，宏被迫在一旁观看。 零二虽然已经离开，但十三小队仍然担心她的战斗方式。(n)

programme.title: My New Boss is Goofy
我的新老板很傻
programme.desc: Momose and Shirosaki are at Shirosaki's hometown, Akita, for work. They end up visiting Shirosaki's home, where Shirosaki's grandmother decides to show them something unexpected….(n)
桃濑和白崎在白崎的家乡秋田工作。 他们最终参观了白崎的家，白崎的祖母决定向他们展示一些意想不到的东西……(n)

programme.title: My New Boss Is Goofy

programme.title: Can a Boy-Girl Friendship Survive?
男女之间的友谊还能维持下去吗？
programme.desc: Yu, Himari and Rion discuss launching "you" as a business when Mao and Azumi drop by to order custom-made accessories. Impressed by the results, they help Yu with promoting the business.(n)
当真央和安昙顺便来订购定制配饰时，优、向向和里昂讨论推出“you”业务。 他们对结果印象深刻，帮助余推广业务。(n)

programme.title: Can a Boy-Girl Friendship Survive?
男女之间的友谊还能维持下去吗？
programme.desc: After the complaint, Sakura is involved and the issue is settled amicably, but with a condition. Himari encourages Yu to continue accessory-making, but fails. Upset, Himari makes a decision….(n)
投诉后，小樱介入，问题得到友好解决，但有条件。 Himari 鼓励 Yu 继续制作配饰，但失败了。 心烦意乱的 Himari 做出了决定……(n)

programme.title: Blue Orchestra Season 2
蓝色乐团第二季
programme.desc: After the seniors' retirement, the Orchestra Club begins preparing for the national competition with a new line-up focusing on the 2nd-years, as they struggle to achieve their ideal sound.(n)
高年级学生退役后，乐团俱乐部以二年级为主的新阵容开始备战全国比赛，为实现理想的声音而奋斗。(n)

programme.title: THE MARGINAL SERVICE
边际服务
programme.desc: Brian, Zeno, Robin, and Bolts head to the Jukai, but are hit by a missile.(n)
布莱恩、芝诺、罗宾和博尔茨前往 Jukai，但被导弹击中。(n)

programme.title: mono
单核细胞增多症
programme.desc: Haruno's dry-cured ham is used in a recipe, and the group sets out to buy Yatsugatake ham. Along the way, they explore abandoned place and ski areas, enjoy Kiyosato curry and visit stores.(n)
食谱中使用了春野的干腌火腿，一行人开始购买八岳火腿。 一路上，他们探索废弃的地方和滑雪场，品尝清里咖喱并参观商店。(n)

programme.title: mono
单核细胞增多症
programme.desc: For Haruno's new manga idea, the girls participate in a spherical stone-hunting event. They go around Yamanashi looking for the roundest stone with the help of a smartphone application, but….(n)
为了实现春野的新漫画想法，女孩们参加了一场球形石头狩猎活动。 他们在智能手机应用程序的帮助下绕山梨县寻找最圆的石头，但是……(n)

programme.title: Li'l Miss Vampire Can't Suck Right
吸血鬼小姐吸不准
programme.desc: Luna Ishikawa is a vampire who is popular in Ootori's class. One day, Ootori discovers her secret—the cool vampire actually sucks at sucking blood!? The new-type spoon-feeding comedy begins!(n)
石川露娜是在大鸟班上很受欢迎的吸血鬼。 有一天，大鸟发现了她的秘密——酷酷的吸血鬼竟然不擅长吸血！？ 新型喂勺喜剧开始了！(n)

programme.title: Touring After the Apocalypse
世界末日后的巡演
programme.desc: On their off-road bike, Yoko and Airi tour a post-apocalyptic Japan overflowing with nature, visiting famous spots without having to deal with traffic or rules to follow.(n)
洋子和爱理骑着越野自行车游览充满自然风光的后世界末日日本，参观著名景点，而无需处理交通问题或遵守规则。(n)

programme.title: Isekai Quartet 3
异世界四重奏3
programme.desc: Peace returns to the school once again… or so everyone thought! Mysterious transfer students join Class 1 while strange incidents begin happening as a series of surprise events await….(n)
学校再次恢复和平……至少每个人都是这么想的！ 神秘的转校生加入一班，奇怪的事件开始发生，一系列令人惊讶的事件正在等待……(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Season 6
王国第 6 季
programme.desc: Qin's next step is to conquer Zhao, but they must get through Zhao's genius strategist, Li Mu. A new strategy involving a new coalition army arises as the fierce battle for Gyou begins!(n)
秦国的下一步目标是征服赵国，但他们必须打通赵国的天才军事家李牧。 随着 Gyou 的激烈战斗开始，涉及新联军的新战略出现了！(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: After quashing the Empire and Soverignty's conspiracy with Alice's help, Iska and team rest at Alsamira, but go back to work upon Sisbell's request. Meanwhile, Alice gets a bad feeling….(n)
在爱丽丝的帮助下粉碎了帝国和主权的阴谋后，伊斯卡和团队在阿尔萨米拉休息，但在西斯贝尔的要求下回去工作。 与此同时，爱丽丝有一种不好的预感……(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: After bumping into Iska in Liesbaden, Alice tails him and finds out that he is in contact with Sisbell. Frustrated with their date-like rendezvous, Alice watches as they grow even closer….(n)
在利斯巴登偶遇伊斯卡后，爱丽丝跟踪他并发现他与西斯贝尔有联系。 爱丽丝对他们约会般的约会感到沮丧，看着他们变得越来越近......(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: Sisbell may be the assassin's next target as she can reenact the past. An explosion occurs near the hotel where Unit N07 hides. When Sisbell investigates, someone starts to attack her….(n)
西斯贝尔可能是刺客的下一个目标，因为她可以重演过去。 N07 部队藏身的酒店附近发生爆炸。 当西斯贝尔调查时，有人开始攻击她……(n)

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
我们最后的十字军东征或新世界的崛起第二季
programme.desc: Alice and Millavair worry over Schwartz's disappearance. Elletear takes on the urgent task of bringing Sisbell back. Sisbell gets a fever and takes the chance to have Iska take care of her.(n)
爱丽丝和米拉维尔对施瓦茨的失踪感到担忧。 艾勒提尔承担起带回西斯贝尔的紧迫任务。 西斯贝尔发烧了，趁机让伊斯卡照顾她。(n)

由野兽泰坦领导的泰坦群将侦察兵团完全包围。 在保卫战马的同时，侦察兵团全力以赴击倒装甲泰坦......(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The Scout Regiment launched their latest weapon, The Thunder Spear, at the Armoured Titan. But to their horror he started to move again and roared towards the sky….(n)
侦察兵团向装甲泰坦发射了他们的最新武器“雷霆之矛”。 但令他们惊恐的是，他又开始移动，并向天空咆哮……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: Every corner is engulfed in flames and the Scout Regiment is split into two teams. Meanwhile, Erwin and Levi are attacked by a barrage of rocks launched by the Beast Titan….(n)
每个角落都被火焰吞没，侦察团分成两队。 与此同时，埃尔文和利威尔遭到了野兽泰坦发射的一系列岩石的攻击……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: Amidst the desperate situation, the Scout Regiment recruit charge towards the Beast Titan, following Erwin's lead. Meanwhile, Eren and co. have come up with another strategy….(n)
在绝望的情况下，侦察兵团新兵在埃尔文的带领下向野兽泰坦冲锋。 与此同时，艾伦和他的同事们。 已经想出了另一个策略……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: Eren stands speechless before Armin. While Eren drowns in deep sorrow, two figures appear above the wall….(n)
艾伦站在阿明面前无言以对。 当艾伦沉浸在深深的悲伤中时，墙壁上方出现了两个人影……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The few survivors of the Scout Regiment are stationed on the walls of Shiganshina District. Meanwhile, Eren steps into the basement below his house….(n)
侦察兵团仅存的少数幸存者驻扎在石甘希纳区的城墙上。 与此同时，艾伦走进他家下面的地下室……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The memories of Eren's father, Grisha, are recorded in the book he left behind. Grisha, still a young man, was forced to face the truth of the world one day….(n)
艾伦的父亲格里沙的记忆记录在他留下的书中。 格里沙，还是个年轻人，有一天被迫面对世界的真相……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The remnants of Grisha's memories tells the story of a mission that was once entrusted to Grisha….(n)
格里沙残留的记忆讲述了曾经被托付给格里沙的一项使命的故事……(n)

programme.title: Attack on Titan Season 3
进击的巨人第三季
programme.desc: The truth behind the walls and true identity of the Titans have been revealed. After learning the truth, Historia and the leaders make a certain decision.(n)
墙后的真相和泰坦的真实身份已经被揭露。 得知真相后，希斯托利亚和领导们做出了一定的决定。(n)

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy II
魔王学园的不合时宜II
programme.desc: 2,000 years ago, at Aharthern. Anos introduces himself as Anoshu Polticoal, a traveling performer. While he observes Leno and Shin's movements, Erdomaid brings information about the gods.(n)
2000 年前，在阿哈瑟恩。 阿诺斯介绍自己为 Anoshu Polticoal，一位巡回表演者。 当艾尔多梅德观察莱诺和辛的动作时，他带来了有关诸神的信息。(n)

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy II
魔王学园的不合时宜II
programme.desc: While investigating in Aharthern, Anos gains a clue from Leno. Anos goes after Erdomaid in Delsgade. Over there, they witness the demons treating humans cruelly.(n)
阿诺斯在阿哈瑟恩调查时，从莱诺那里得到了线索。 阿诺斯在德尔斯加德追捕埃尔多梅德。 在那里，他们目睹了恶魔残忍地对待人类。(n)

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] 2nd SEASON -The Eve of Awakening-
魔法少女小圆外传 [MAGIA RECORD] 第二季 -觉醒前夜-
programme.desc: Kuroe accompanies Iroha to search for her friends from the Mikazuki Dorm. The feelings of the girls who serve the Magius grow complicated as Toka reveals a plan to save all magical girls….(n)
黑惠陪彩叶去三日月宿舍寻找朋友。 当十香透露了拯救所有魔法少女的计划时，侍奉魔术师的女孩们的心情变得复杂起来……(n)

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] 2nd SEASON -The Eve of Awakening-
魔法少女小圆外传 [MAGIA RECORD] 第二季 -觉醒前夜-
programme.desc: Left alone to fight Magius, Kuroe hears her Doppel's voice. Witches gather in Kamihama according to Magius' plan. On the way to meet Iroha, Yachiyo runs into the magical girls from Mitakihara City.(n)
独自一人与马吉斯战斗的黑惠听到了她分身的声音。 按照马吉乌斯的计划，魔女们聚集在神滨。 在去见伊吕波的路上，八千代遇到了见泷原市的魔法少女们。(n)

programme.title: Blue Orchestra Season 2
蓝色乐团第二季
programme.desc: After the seniors' retirement, the Orchestra Club begins preparing for the national competition with a new line-up focusing on the 2nd-years, as they struggle to achieve their ideal sound.(n)
高年级学生退役后，乐团俱乐部以二年级为主的新阵容开始备战全国比赛，为实现理想的声音而奋斗。(n)

programme.title: Blue Orchestra Season 2
蓝色乐团第二季
programme.desc: After the seniors' retirement, the Orchestra Club begins preparing for the national competition with a new line-up focusing on the 2nd-years, as they struggle to achieve their ideal sound.(n)
高年级学生退役后，乐团俱乐部以二年级为主的新阵容开始备战全国比赛，为实现理想的声音而奋斗。(n)

programme.title: Touring After the Apocalypse
世界末日后的巡演
programme.desc: On their off-road bike, Yoko and Airi tour a post-apocalyptic Japan overflowing with nature, visiting famous spots without having to deal with traffic or rules to follow.(n)
洋子和爱理骑着越野自行车游览充满自然风光的后世界末日日本，参观著名景点，而无需处理交通问题或遵守规则。(n)

programme.title: Touring After the Apocalypse
世界末日后的巡演
programme.desc: On their off-road bike, Yoko and Airi tour a post-apocalyptic Japan overflowing with nature, visiting famous spots without having to deal with traffic or rules to follow.(n)
洋子和爱理骑着越野自行车游览充满自然风光的后世界末日日本，参观著名景点，而无需处理交通问题或遵守规则。(n)

programme.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: SEASON 2
古代魔法师的新娘：第二季
programme.desc: People have nightmares for unknown cause. While the College is in chaos, Chise comes across a forbidden book. When she finally gets rest, a sense of unease begins to pervade the College.(n)
人们会出于不明原因做噩梦。 学院一片混乱之际，智世发现了一本禁书。 当她终于得到休息时，一种不安的感觉开始弥漫在学院里。(n)

programme.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: SEASON 2
古代魔法师的新娘：第二季
programme.desc: The girl who wishes to be loved transforms into something monstrous. The girl who once yearned for someone to turn to–what does she now desire? Even she herself no longer knows.(n)
渴望被爱的女孩变成了怪物。 那个曾经渴望有人依靠的女孩，现在她渴望什么呢？ 连她自己都已经不知道了。(n)

programme.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: SEASON 2
古代魔法师的新娘：第二季
programme.desc: Chise takes a step forward to save her friend. If she doesn't act now, her friend will die.(n)
智世向前迈出了一步，拯救了她的朋友。 如果她现在不采取行动，她的朋友就会死。(n)

programme.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: SEASON 2
古代魔法师的新娘：第二季
programme.desc: A distant memory. The day the spirits were born. The day the most precious life was born. Remember and tell the daughter that she was loved. No matter what, that duty must be fulfilled.(n)
遥远的记忆。 灵魂诞生的那一天。 最珍贵的生命诞生的那一天。 记住并告诉女儿她是被爱的。 无论如何，这个义务都必须履行。(n)

独自一人与马吉斯战斗的黑惠听到了她分身的声音。 按照马吉乌斯的计划，魔女们聚集在神滨。 在去见伊吕波的路上，八千代遇到了见泷原市的魔法少女们。(n)

programme.title: Blue Orchestra Season 2
蓝色乐团第二季
programme.desc: After the seniors' retirement, the Orchestra Club begins preparing for the national competition with a new line-up focusing on the 2nd-years, as they struggle to achieve their ideal sound.(n)
高年级学生退役后，乐团俱乐部以二年级为主的新阵容开始备战全国比赛，为实现理想的声音而奋斗。(n)

programme.title: Blue Orchestra Season 2
蓝色乐团第二季
programme.desc: After the seniors' retirement, the Orchestra Club begins preparing for the national competition with a new line-up focusing on the 2nd-years, as they struggle to achieve their ideal sound.(n)
高年级学生退役后，乐团俱乐部以二年级为主的新阵容开始备战全国比赛，为实现理想的声音而奋斗。(n)

programme.title: Touring After the Apocalypse
世界末日后的巡演
programme.desc: On their off-road bike, Yoko and Airi tour a post-apocalyptic Japan overflowing with nature, visiting famous spots without having to deal with traffic or rules to follow.(n)
洋子和爱理骑着越野自行车游览充满自然风光的后世界末日日本，参观著名景点，而无需处理交通问题或遵守规则。(n)

programme.title: Touring After the Apocalypse
世界末日后的巡演
programme.desc: On their off-road bike, Yoko and Airi tour a post-apocalyptic Japan overflowing with nature, visiting famous spots without having to deal with traffic or rules to follow.(n)
洋子和爱理骑着越野自行车游览充满自然风光的后世界末日日本，参观著名景点，而无需处理交通问题或遵守规则。(n)

programme.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: SEASON 2
古代魔法师的新娘：第二季
programme.desc: People have nightmares for unknown cause. While the College is in chaos, Chise comes across a forbidden book. When she finally gets rest, a sense of unease begins to pervade the College.(n)
人们会出于不明原因做噩梦。 学院一片混乱之际，智世发现了一本禁书。 当她终于得到休息时，一种不安的感觉开始弥漫在学院里。(n)

programme.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: SEASON 2
古代魔法师的新娘：第二季
programme.desc: The girl who wishes to be loved transforms into something monstrous. The girl who once yearned for someone to turn to–what does she now desire? Even she herself no longer knows.(n)
渴望被爱的女孩变成了怪物。 那个曾经渴望有人依靠的女孩，现在她渴望什么呢？ 连她自己都已经不知道了。(n)

programme.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: SEASON 2
古代魔法师的新娘：第二季
programme.desc: Chise takes a step forward to save her friend. If she doesn't act now, her friend will die.(n)
智世向前迈出了一步，拯救了她的朋友。 如果她现在不采取行动，她的朋友就会死。(n)

programme.title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: SEASON 2
古代魔法师的新娘：第二季
programme.desc: A distant memory. The day the spirits were born. The day the most precious life was born. Remember and tell the daughter that she was loved. No matter what, that duty must be fulfilled.(n)
遥远的记忆。 灵魂诞生的那一天。 最珍贵的生命诞生的那一天。 记住并告诉女儿她是被爱的。 无论如何，这个义务都必须履行。(n)

programme.title: Food for the Soul
灵魂的食粮
programme.desc: The girls decide to run a stall at the university fair. With help from Sakura, the girls come up with their dish. Tsutsuji trains Nana on approaching people. The day of the fair arrives….(n)
女孩们决定在大学博览会上摆摊。 在小樱的帮助下，女孩们拿出了她们的菜肴。 杜鹃训练娜娜如何接近人。 展会的日子到了……(n)

programme.title: Food for the Soul
灵魂的食粮
programme.desc: The girls visits Mako's hometown. After arriving at Mako's grandmother's house, Tsutsuji and Nana try to cook with traditional cookware while Mako and Shinon visit old friends.(n)
女孩们拜访了真子的家乡。 到达真子祖母家后，筒路和娜娜尝试用传统炊具做饭，而真子和诗浓则拜访老朋友。(n)

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS Season 2
偶像大师闪亮色彩第二季
programme.desc: Mei gets used to being on stage and Fuyuko tells her that soon she can go on stage as her true self. Mei gets worried as her mysterious idol persona was a facade to hide her inexperience….(n)
梅已经习惯了在舞台上，冬子告诉她，很快她就能以真实的自己登上舞台。 梅很担心，因为她神秘的偶像角色只是为了隐藏她的经验不足......(n)

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS Season 2
偶像大师闪亮色彩第二季
programme.desc: Chiyoko pauses at the question: "What kind of idol do you want to be?" Having become an idol to fill in for a friend, she wonders if she's chasing her friend's dream and reflects on her own.(n)
千代子在这个问题上停了下来：“你想成为什么样的偶像？” 为了代替朋友而成为偶像，她想知道自己是否在追逐朋友的梦想，并反思自己。(n)

programme.title: Li'l Miss Vampire Can't Suck Right
吸血鬼小姐吸不准
programme.desc: Luna Ishikawa is a vampire who is popular in Ootori's class. One day, Ootori discovers her secret—the cool vampire actually sucks at sucking blood!? The new-type spoon-feeding comedy begins!(n)
石川露娜是在大鸟班上很受欢迎的吸血鬼。 有一天，大鸟发现了她的秘密——酷酷的吸血鬼竟然不擅长吸血！？ 新型喂勺喜剧开始了！(n)

programme.title: Li'l Miss Vampire Can't Suck Right
吸血鬼小姐吸不准
programme.desc: Luna Ishikawa is a vampire who is popular in Ootori's class. One day, Ootori discovers her secret—the cool vampire actually sucks at sucking blood!? The new-type spoon-feeding comedy begins!(n)
石川露娜是在大鸟班上很受欢迎的吸血鬼。 有一天，大鸟发现了她的秘密——酷酷的吸血鬼竟然不擅长吸血！？ 新型喂勺喜剧开始了！(n)

programme.title: PandoraHearts
潘多拉之心
programme.desc: Everyone returns to the Rainsworth manor after their scuffle with the Baskervilles. However, Oz, Gilbert, and Alice are still depressed over what happened at the Lutwidge Academy. Break and Sharon try to help by asking them what is on their minds, but they get much more than they bargained for...(n)
与巴斯克维尔家族发生冲突后，所有人都回到了雷恩斯沃斯庄园。 然而，奥兹、吉尔伯特和爱丽丝仍然对路特维奇学院发生的事情感到沮丧。 布雷克和莎伦试图通过询问他们的想法来提供帮助，但他们得到的远远超出了他们的预期……(n)

programme.title: PandoraHearts
潘多拉之心
programme.desc: To find out more about the Tragedy of Sablier, which is the key to discovering the truth, Oz and his group decide to pay a visit to Rufus Barma, the longest-living man among the Four Great Dukes. The duke they seek happens to be a bizarre round creature in a suit. Duke Barma demands information from Break in exchange for his own.(n)
为了了解更多有关萨比利尔悲剧的信息，这是查明真相的关键，奥兹一行人决定拜访四大公爵中最长寿的人鲁弗斯·巴尔马。 他们寻找的公爵恰好是一个穿着西装的怪异圆形生物。 巴尔马公爵要求布雷克提供信息以换取他自己的信息。(n)

programme.title: The Case Study of Vanitas
瓦尼塔斯的案例研究
programme.desc: Vanitas realizes that Chloé cannot be cured by the Book of Vanitas. Jeanne reaches out to Chloé, who has lost control. In a heated battle, Noé is engulfed in flames.(n)
瓦尼塔斯意识到克洛伊无法通过瓦尼塔斯之书治愈。 珍妮向失去控制的克洛伊伸出援手。 在一场激烈的战斗中，诺埃被火焰吞没。(n)

programme.title: The Case Study of Vanitas
瓦尼塔斯的案例研究
programme.desc: Upon returning to Paris after the Gévaudan events, Roland and Olivier deduce that Vanitas is in “love” with Jeanne.(n)
热沃丹事件后返回巴黎后，罗兰和奥利维尔推断瓦尼塔斯爱上了珍妮。(n)

programme.title: SHINEPOST
欣邮
programme.desc: Naoki suggests that Momiji Ito and Yukine Gionji return to TiNgS. Yukine isn't convinced by Haru and the others, so they try persuading Momiji….(n)
直树建议伊藤红叶和祗园寺雪音回到TiNgS。 雪音不相信春等人，所以他们试图说服红叶……(n)

programme.title: SHINEPOST
欣邮
programme.desc: Yukine recalls the days when “TINGS” shared the same dream. However, she came to discover a major secret about Haru.(n)
Yukine回忆起“TINGS”拥有同样梦想的日子。 然而，她发现了关于Haru的一个重大秘密。(n)

女孩们拜访了真子的家乡。 到达真子祖母家后，筒路和娜娜尝试用传统炊具做饭，而真子和诗浓则拜访老朋友。(n)

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS Season 2
偶像大师闪亮色彩第二季
programme.desc: Mei gets used to being on stage and Fuyuko tells her that soon she can go on stage as her true self. Mei gets worried as her mysterious idol persona was a facade to hide her inexperience….(n)
梅已经习惯了在舞台上，冬子告诉她，很快她就能以真实的自己登上舞台。 梅很担心，因为她神秘的偶像角色只是为了隐藏她的经验不足......(n)

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS Season 2
偶像大师闪亮色彩第二季
programme.desc: Chiyoko pauses at the question: "What kind of idol do you want to be?" Having become an idol to fill in for a friend, she wonders if she's chasing her friend's dream and reflects on her own.(n)
千代子在这个问题上停了下来：“你想成为什么样的偶像？” 为了代替朋友而成为偶像，她想知道自己是否在追逐朋友的梦想，并反思自己。(n)

programme.title: Li'l Miss Vampire Can't Suck Right
吸血鬼小姐吸不准
programme.desc: Luna Ishikawa is a vampire who is popular in Ootori's class. One day, Ootori discovers her secret—the cool vampire actually sucks at sucking blood!? The new-type spoon-feeding comedy begins!(n)
石川露娜是在大鸟班上很受欢迎的吸血鬼。 有一天，大鸟发现了她的秘密——酷酷的吸血鬼竟然不擅长吸血！？ 新型喂勺喜剧开始了！(n)

programme.title: Li'l Miss Vampire Can't Suck Right
吸血鬼小姐吸不准
programme.desc: Luna Ishikawa is a vampire who is popular in Ootori's class. One day, Ootori discovers her secret—the cool vampire actually sucks at sucking blood!? The new-type spoon-feeding comedy begins!(n)
石川露娜是在大鸟班上很受欢迎的吸血鬼。 有一天，大鸟发现了她的秘密——酷酷的吸血鬼竟然不擅长吸血！？ 新型喂勺喜剧开始了！(n)

programme.title: PandoraHearts
潘多拉之心
programme.desc: Everyone returns to the Rainsworth manor after their scuffle with the Baskervilles. However, Oz, Gilbert, and Alice are still depressed over what happened at the Lutwidge Academy. Break and Sharon try to help by asking them what is on their minds, but they get much more than they bargained for...(n)
与巴斯克维尔家族发生冲突后，所有人都回到了雷恩斯沃斯庄园。 然而，奥兹、吉尔伯特和爱丽丝仍然对路特维奇学院发生的事情感到沮丧。 布雷克和莎伦试图通过询问他们的想法来提供帮助，但他们得到的远远超出了他们的预期……(n)

programme.title: PandoraHearts
潘多拉之心
programme.desc: To find out more about the Tragedy of Sablier, which is the key to discovering the truth, Oz and his group decide to pay a visit to Rufus Barma, the longest-living man among the Four Great Dukes. The duke they seek happens to be a bizarre round creature in a suit. Duke Barma demands information from Break in exchange for his own.(n)
为了了解更多有关萨比利尔悲剧的信息，这是查明真相的关键，奥兹一行人决定拜访四大公爵中最长寿的人鲁弗斯·巴尔马。 他们寻找的公爵恰好是一个穿着西装的怪异圆形生物。 巴尔马公爵要求布雷克提供信息以换取他自己的信息。(n)

programme.title: The Case Study of Vanitas
瓦尼塔斯的案例研究
programme.desc: Vanitas realizes that Chloé cannot be cured by the Book of Vanitas. Jeanne reaches out to Chloé, who has lost control. In a heated battle, Noé is engulfed in flames.(n)
瓦尼塔斯意识到克洛伊无法通过瓦尼塔斯之书治愈。 珍妮向失去控制的克洛伊伸出援手。 在一场激烈的战斗中，诺埃被火焰吞没。(n)

programme.title: The Case Study of Vanitas
瓦尼塔斯的案例研究
programme.desc: Upon returning to Paris after the Gévaudan events, Roland and Olivier deduce that Vanitas is in “love” with Jeanne.(n)
热沃丹事件后返回巴黎后，罗兰和奥利维尔推断瓦尼塔斯爱上了珍妮。(n)

programme.title: SHINEPOST
欣邮
programme.desc: Naoki suggests that Momiji Ito and Yukine Gionji return to TiNgS. Yukine isn't convinced by Haru and the others, so they try persuading Momiji….(n)
直树建议伊藤红叶和祗园寺雪音回到TiNgS。 雪音不相信春等人，所以他们试图说服红叶……(n)

programme.title: SHINEPOST
欣邮
programme.desc: Yukine recalls the days when “TINGS” shared the same dream. However, she came to discover a major secret about Haru.(n)
Yukine回忆起“TINGS”拥有同样梦想的日子。 然而，她发现了关于Haru的一个重大秘密。(n)

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
伊莉斯博士：提灯的皇家女士
programme.desc: Ron suddenly invites Elise out. In the midst of their dream-like date, they are embroiled in an incident. While they grow closer over the incident, Ron has something on his mind….(n)
罗恩突然邀请伊莉丝出去。 在他们梦幻般的约会中，他们卷入了一场事件。 当他们因这件事变得更加亲密时，罗恩心里有一些想法……(n)

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
伊莉斯博士：提灯的皇家女士
programme.desc: At the award ceremony for the Medal of the Imperial Rose, Minchester collapses. Elise tries to find out the cause, but fails. Meanwhile, rumors of an attempted murder on the king spreads….(n)
在皇家玫瑰勋章的颁奖典礼上，明彻斯特崩溃了。 埃莉斯试图找出原因，但失败了。 与此同时，有关谋杀国王未遂的谣言四处传播……(n)

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma How to Love Your Elf Bride
大恶魔的困境 如何爱你的精灵新娘
programme.desc: Zagan and Barbatos meets Raphael, the fearsome Holy Sword wielder, and learns about Chastille's punishment. Back at the castle, Barbatos arrives with Chastille, who has been poisoned.(n)
扎甘和巴巴托斯遇到了可怕的圣剑持有者拉斐尔，并了解了查斯蒂尔受到的惩罚。 回到城堡，巴巴托斯带着中毒的查斯蒂尔来到了。(n)

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma How to Love Your Elf Bride
大恶魔的困境 如何爱你的精灵新娘
programme.desc: Foll departs for the Archdemon Hall, seeking new power for her revenge. She confronts Raphael, who has been following her, and realizes the connection between him and her murdered father.(n)
福尔启程前往大恶魔大厅，寻找新的复仇力量。 她面对一直跟踪她的拉斐尔，并意识到他和她被谋杀的父亲之间的联系。(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Season 6
王国第 6 季
programme.desc: Qin's next step is to conquer Zhao, but they must get through Zhao's genius strategist, Li Mu. A new strategy involving a new coalition army arises as the fierce battle for Gyou begins!(n)
秦国的下一步目标是征服赵国，但他们必须打通赵国的天才军事家李牧。 随着 Gyou 的激烈战斗开始，涉及新联军的新战略出现了！(n)
