programme.title: CYRIL: SIMPLY MAGIC
西里尔：简直就是魔法
programme.desc: Join Cyril on a journey of self-discovery in various locations across Asia as he shares the marvels of his magic.(n)
与西里尔一起踏上亚洲各地的自我发现之旅，听他分享他的魔法奇迹。(n)

programme.title: HUDSON & REX (SEASON 6)
哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: In a case that unfolds in real-time, Charlie and Rex have one hour to disarm a masked gunman holding the employees of an insurance office hostage.(n)
在一个实时展开的案件中，查理和雷克斯有一个小时的时间解除一名劫持保险公司员工作为人质的蒙面枪手的武装。(n)

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED (SEASON 5)
FBI：头号通缉犯（第 5 季）
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force launches into full gear after multiple bombings appear to be targeting retired NYPD officers. Also, Ray decides he's ready to take the next step in his relationship with Cora.(n)
在多起针对退休纽约市警察局警官的爆炸事件发生后，逃犯特遣部队全面启动。 此外，雷决定他已准备好在与科拉的关系中迈出下一步。(n)

programme.title: THE ROOKIE: FEDS (SEASON 1)
新秀：联邦调查局（第一季）
programme.desc: Garza and team are on the hunt for a ruthless gang leader on a mission for revenge.(n)
加尔萨和他的团队正在追捕一名残酷的帮派头目，并执行复仇任务。(n)

programme.title: FBI (SEASON 6)
联邦调查局（第六季）
programme.desc: When a bus explosion kills several innocent people, the team jumps into action to take down the responsible terrorist organization. Meanwhile, Scola tries to balance fatherhood with the job.(n)
当公共汽车爆炸造成数名无辜者死亡时，团队立即采取行动，铲除肇事的恐怖组织。 与此同时，斯科拉试图平衡父亲身份和工作。(n)

programme.title: RED EYE (SEASON 1)
红眼（第一季）
programme.desc: Nolan recounts the events in Beijing, and Hana continues to probe the events on-board.(n)
诺兰讲述了北京发生的事情，哈娜则继续调查船上发生的事情。(n)

programme.title: WIPEOUT (SEASON 9)
消灭（第 9 季）
programme.desc: Tonight's episode of Wipeout is raining singles. Everyone for themself.(n)
今晚的《Wipeout》节目中单打如雨。 每个人都为了自己。(n)

programme.title: WIPEOUT (SEASON 9)
消灭（第 9 季）
programme.desc: Everyone deserves a second chance! And this week on Wipeout, John and Nicole have each handpicked four teams to return to take on the Wipeout course…again!(n)
每个人都应该有第二次机会！ 本周，在 Wipeout 比赛中，约翰和妮可各自精心挑选了四支球队，再次参加 Wipeout 课程！(n)

programme.title: THE AMAZING RACE (SEASON 35)
极速竞速（第 35 季）
programme.desc: Teams continue racing in Slovenia, carefully traveling on foot-carrying wooden pieces on their back, descending deep into a cave and assembling a giant dragon and scraping off mussels and barnacles in the waters.(n)
队伍继续在斯洛文尼亚比赛，小心翼翼地用脚背着木片行进，深入洞穴，组装一条巨龙，刮掉水中的贻贝和藤壶。(n)

programme.title: THE AMAZING RACE (SEASON 35)
极速竞速（第 35 季）
programme.desc: Teams travel 1,000 miles from Slovenia to Sweden where they must face their fears and skydive from 10,000 feet over the Baltic sea, recreate a midsummer tradition and sort through recyclable items.(n)
团队从斯洛文尼亚出发 1,000 英里到达瑞典，在那里他们必须面对恐惧，从波罗的海上空 10,000 英尺的高空跳伞，重现仲夏传统，并对可回收物品进行分类。(n)

programme.title: PASSENGERS
乘客
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.(n)
一艘载着数千人前往遥远殖民地星球的宇宙飞船，其中一个睡眠室出现故障。 结果，一名乘客比其他人早了 90 年醒来。(n)

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE (SEASON 1)
波士顿蓝（第一季）
programme.desc: NYPD detective Danny Reagan teams up with Boston detective Lena Silver to investigate a deadly fire at a tech company. As they dig deeper, they uncover a web of secrets involving facial recognition technology, family ties and a search for justice.(n)
纽约警察局侦探丹尼·里根与波士顿侦探莉娜·西尔弗联手调查一家科技公司发生的致命火灾。 随着深入挖掘，他们发现了一张涉及面部识别技术、家庭关系和寻求正义的秘密网。(n)

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS (SEASON 3)
犯罪现场调查：维加斯（第 3 季）
programme.desc: When a fitness guru is found dead in a gym sauna and his soon to be son-in-law is found dead from an accident, the CSI team investigates to see if these deaths are unrelated tragic accidents or if they're connected.(n)
当一名健身大师被发现死于健身房桑拿房，而他即将成为女婿的人也被发现死于事故时，犯罪现场调查小组展开调查，看看这些死亡是否是无关的悲惨事故，或者是否有关联。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：起源（第 2 季）
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Marine who had recently been handpicked for a classified mission. Also, Wheeler's personal life is upended, Lala is thrown by unexpected news from Vera, and Gibbs and Diane double-date with Randy and his wife.(n)
该小组调查了一名最近被精心挑选执行机密任务的海军陆战队员被谋杀的事件。 此外，惠勒的个人生活被颠覆，拉拉因维拉的意外消息而感到震惊，吉布斯和黛安与兰迪和他的妻子进行了双重约会。

programme.title: THE RAINMAKER (SEASON 1)
造雨者（第一季）
programme.desc: Rudy must decide whether to make an argument he can win or to expose the truth.(n)
鲁迪必须决定是进行一场他能获胜的争论还是揭露真相。(n)

programme.title: THE HUNTING PARTY (SEASON 1)
狩猎队（第一季）
programme.desc: The student becomes the master, when an escaped serial killer from the Pit decides to adopt another inmate's style of killing.(n)
当一名从监狱逃脱的连环杀手决定采用另一名囚犯的杀人方式时，学生成为了大师。(n)

programme.title: GODZILLA MINUS ONE
哥斯拉减一
programme.desc: In postwar Japan, a new terror rises; Godzilla. Will the devastated people be able to survive... let alone fight back?(n)
战后的日本，新的恐怖势力崛起； 哥斯拉。 饱受摧残的人们能否生存……更不用说反击了？(n)

programme.title: AMERICAN NINJA WARRIOR (SEASON 14)
美国忍者武士（第 14 季）
programme.desc: The semifinals continue as competitors face up to 10 obstacles, including the new obstacle Padlock; the top two runs of the night face off on the Power Tower.(n)
半决赛继续进行，参赛者面临多达 10 个障碍，其中包括新障碍 Padlock； 当晚的两场比赛在电力塔上对峙。(n)

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS (SEASON 3)
犯罪现场调查：维加斯（第 3 季）
programme.desc: When a fitness guru is found dead in a gym sauna and his soon to be son-in-law is found dead from an accident, the CSI team investigates to see if these deaths are unrelated tragic accidents or if they're connected.(n)
当一名健身大师被发现死于健身房桑拿房，而他即将成为女婿的人也被发现死于事故时，犯罪现场调查小组展开调查，看看这些死亡是否是无关的悲惨事故，或者是否有关联。(n)

programme.title: THE RAINMAKER (SEASON 1)
造雨者（第一季）
programme.desc: Rudy must decide whether to make an argument he can win or to expose the truth.(n)
鲁迪必须决定是进行一场他能获胜的争论还是揭露真相。(n)

programme.title: THE HUNTING PARTY (SEASON 1)
狩猎队（第一季）
programme.desc: The student becomes the master, when an escaped serial killer from the Pit decides to adopt another inmate's style of killing.(n)
当一名从监狱逃脱的连环杀手决定采用另一名囚犯的杀人方式时，学生成为了大师。(n)

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE (SEASON 1)
波士顿蓝（第一季）
programme.desc: Danny and Lena's investigation into a robbery gone wrong quickly turns personal, pushing Lena to devise a bold plan that tests Mae's boundaries. Meanwhile, Sean and Jonah face rising tensions with Boston's firefighters, and Sarah clashes with boyfriend Seth over family discipline.(n)
丹尼和莉娜对一起抢劫案的调查很快就变成了针对个人的调查，促使莉娜制定了一个大胆的计划来测试梅的底线。 与此同时，肖恩和乔纳与波士顿消防队员的关系日益紧张，莎拉与男友塞斯因家庭纪律发生冲突。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：起源（第 2 季）
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Marine who had recently been handpicked for a classified mission. Also, Wheeler's personal life is upended, Lala is thrown by unexpected news from Vera, and Gibbs and Diane double-date with Randy and his wife.(n)
该小组调查了一名最近被精心挑选执行机密任务的海军陆战队员被谋杀的事件。 此外，惠勒的个人生活被颠覆，拉拉因维拉的意外消息而感到震惊，吉布斯和黛安与兰迪和他的妻子进行了双重约会。

programme.title: I KNOW WHAT YOU DID LAST SUMMER
我知道你去年夏天做了什么
programme.desc: When a deadly secret resurfaces, five friends are stalked by a vengeful killer.(n)
当一个致命的秘密重新浮出水面时，五个朋友被一个复仇心切的杀手跟踪。(n)

programme.title: I KNOW WHAT YOU DID LAST SUMMER

programme.desc: When a deadly secret resurfaces, five friends are stalked by a vengeful killer.(n)

programme.title: PASSENGERS
乘客
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.(n)
一艘载着数千人前往遥远殖民地星球的宇宙飞船，其中一个睡眠室出现故障。 结果，一名乘客比其他人早了 90 年醒来。(n)

programme.title: CYRIL: SIMPLY MAGIC
西里尔：简直就是魔法
programme.desc: Join Cyril on a journey of self-discovery in various locations across Asia as he shares the marvels of his magic.(n)
与西里尔一起踏上亚洲各地的自我发现之旅，听他分享他的魔法奇迹。(n)

programme.title: HUDSON & REX (SEASON 6)
哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: When a local whale watching boat mysteriously returns to harbour without its passengers, Charlie and Rex must race against time to find the missing tourists.(n)
当当地一艘观鲸船在没有乘客的情况下神秘地返回港口时，查理和雷克斯必须争分夺秒地寻找失踪的游客。(n)

programme.title: HUDSON & REX (SEASON 6)
哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: As a pair of armed robbers rip through St. John's, Charlie and Rex work fast to stop them by uncovering the truth behind the spree..(n)
两名武装劫匪闯入圣约翰教堂，查理和雷克斯迅速行动，揭开狂欢背后的真相，阻止他们。

programme.title: THE AMAZING RACE (SEASON 35)
极速竞速（第 35 季）
programme.desc: Teams travel to Dublin, Ireland, where they must complete four challenges in the penultimate leg, including swimming in the Irish Sea, dancing with the legendary Riverdance troupe, scoring a point with the hurling team and reciting quotes from a famed Irish novelist.(n)
队伍前往爱尔兰都柏林，在那里他们必须完成倒数第二赛段的四项挑战，包括在爱尔兰海游泳、与传奇大河之舞剧团共舞、与投掷队一起得分以及背诵爱尔兰著名小说家的名言。

programme.title: THE AMAZING RACE (SEASON 35)
极速竞速（第 35 季）
programme.desc: The final three teams travel to Seattle, where they must complete three challenges in a scramble leg — a first in the show's history. The challenges include swinging from a high trapeze, glassblowing and being a roadie for a grunge band.(n)
最后三支队伍将前往西雅图，在那里他们必须在争夺赛中完成三项挑战——这在节目历史上尚属首次。 挑战包括高空秋千、吹制玻璃以及担任垃圾摇滚乐队的巡演人员。(n)

哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: When a prominent Judge disappears, Charlie and Rex piece together the crime with the help of a blind true crime podcaster who insists she heard a murder but could not see the culprit.(n)
当一位著名法官失踪后，查理和雷克斯在一位盲人真实犯罪播客的帮助下拼凑出犯罪事实，播客坚称她听到了谋杀案，但看不到罪魁祸首。(n)

programme.title: HUDSON & REX (SEASON 6)
哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: In a case that unfolds in real-time, Charlie and Rex have one hour to disarm a masked gunman holding the employees of an insurance office hostage.(n)

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED (SEASON 5)
FBI：头号通缉犯（第 5 季）
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force launches into full gear after multiple bombings appear to be targeting retired NYPD officers. Also, Ray decides he's ready to take the next step in his relationship with Cora.(n)
在多起针对退休纽约市警察局警官的爆炸事件发生后，逃犯特遣部队全面启动。 此外，雷决定他已准备好在与科拉的关系中迈出下一步。(n)

programme.title: FBI (SEASON 6)
联邦调查局（第六季）
programme.desc: When a bus explosion kills several innocent people, the team jumps into action to take down the responsible terrorist organization. Meanwhile, Scola tries to balance fatherhood with the job.(n)
当公共汽车爆炸造成数名无辜者死亡时，团队立即采取行动，铲除肇事的恐怖组织。 与此同时，斯科拉试图平衡父亲身份和工作。(n)

programme.desc: A murder in a local park points to someone dressed as The Night Keeper, an obscure TV Superhero, setting Charlie and Rex off to find a vigilante roaming the streets.(n)
当地公园发生的一起谋杀案表明有人打扮成电视超级英雄守夜人，让查理和雷克斯发现一名在街上游荡的义务警员。

programme.title: CSI: VEGAS (SEASON 3)
犯罪现场调查：维加斯（第 3 季）
programme.desc: When a fitness guru is found dead in a gym sauna and his soon to be son-in-law is found dead from an accident, the CSI team investigates to see if these deaths are unrelated tragic accidents or if they're connected.(n)
当一名健身大师被发现死于健身房桑拿房，而他即将成为女婿的人也被发现死于事故时，犯罪现场调查小组展开调查，看看这些死亡是否是无关的悲惨事故，或者是否有关联。(n)

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED (SEASON 5)
FBI：头号通缉犯（第 5 季）
programme.desc: When the woman whose visage is the face of a popular AI bot is found violently murdered inside a Brooklyn hotel room, the Fugitive Task Force jumps into action to find out who lured her there in the first place.(n)
当一名长着流行人工智能机器人面孔的女性被发现在布鲁克林一家酒店房间内遭到暴力谋杀时，逃犯特遣部队立即采取行动，找出最初是谁将她引诱到那里的。(n)

海军罪案调查处：悉尼（第 2 季）
programme.desc: NCIS: Sydney is thrown into the murky world of online conspiracies after a car owned by a U.S. Navy cyber engineer explodes just as her teenage daughter was about to take a driving lesson.(n)

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE (SEASON 1)
波士顿蓝（第一季）
programme.desc: Danny and Lena's investigation into a robbery gone wrong quickly turns personal, pushing Lena to devise a bold plan that tests Mae's boundaries. Meanwhile, Sean and Jonah face rising tensions with Boston's firefighters, and Sarah clashes with boyfriend Seth over family discipline.(n)
丹尼和莉娜对一起抢劫案的调查很快就变成了针对个人的调查，促使莉娜制定了一个大胆的计划来测试梅的底线。 与此同时，肖恩和乔纳与波士顿消防队员的关系日益紧张，莎拉与男友塞斯因家庭纪律发生冲突。(n)

海军罪案调查处：悉尼（第 2 季）

programme.title: RED EYE (SEASON 1)
红眼（第一季）
programme.desc: The truth emerges about events on-board forcing Hana to take drastic action.(n)
船上事件的真相浮出水面，迫使哈娜采取严厉行动。(n)

programme.title: CYRIL: SIMPLY MAGIC
西里尔：简直就是魔法
programme.desc: Join Cyril on a journey of self-discovery in various locations across Asia as he shares the marvels of his magic.(n)
与西里尔一起踏上亚洲各地的自我发现之旅，听他分享他的魔法奇迹。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: SYDNEY (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：悉尼（第 2 季）
programme.desc: When a Petty Officer is found brutally murdered and frozen, it leads NCIS: Sydney into a twisted underworld of seafood and sex trafficking.(n)
当一名军士被发现惨遭谋杀和冰冻后，海军罪案调查处：悉尼陷入了海鲜和性交易的扭曲地下世界。(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 6)
扑打。 （第 6 季）
programme.desc: SWAT teams with Major Crimes for a high-stakes mission to extract an undercover officer from a dangerous crime ring.(n)
特警队与重大犯罪部门联手执行一项高风险任务，从危险的犯罪团伙中救出一名卧底警官。(n)

programme.title: HUDSON & REX (SEASON 6)
哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: An instructor at a prestigious Ballet School dies mysteriously and Charlie and Rex discover he has ties to Russian spies.(n)
一所著名芭蕾舞学校的一名教练神秘死亡，查理和雷克斯发现他与俄罗斯间谍有联系。(n)

programme.title: THE RAINMAKER (SEASON 1)
造雨者（第一季）
programme.desc: Up against Sarah, Rudy wonders if she's still the woman he once knew and loved.(n)
面对莎拉，鲁迪想知道她是否还是他曾经认识和爱过的那个女人。(n)

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED (SEASON 5)
FBI：头号通缉犯（第 5 季）
programme.desc: When a high school debate team and their English teacher are kidnapped in rural Pennsylvania, the Fugitive Task Force rushes to the scene to find out who took them and what they want before it's too late. Also, Remy helps Corey out of a bind.(n)
当一支高中辩论队和他们的英语老师在宾夕法尼亚州乡村被绑架时，逃亡特遣队赶到现场，想在为时已晚之前找出是谁绑架了他们以及他们想要什么。 此外，雷米帮助科里摆脱困境。(n)

programme.title: RED EYE (SEASON 1)
红眼（第一季）
programme.desc: Hana and Delaney hatch a daring plan to expose the conspiracy.(n)
哈娜和德莱尼制定了一个大胆的计划来揭露这个阴谋。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: SYDNEY (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：悉尼（第 2 季）
programme.desc: The suspected suicide of a former US Navy SEAL brings NCIS: Sydney to a wellness retreat to investigate a group of his fellow former SEAL buddies... only to find themselves caught in the crosshairs.(n)
一名前美国海豹突击队队员疑似自杀，《海军罪案调查处：悉尼》前往一处疗养院调查他的一群前海豹突击队战友……却发现自己陷入了十字准线之中。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：起源（第 2 季）
programme.desc: When Lala's favorite CI is shot, the team joins forces with Oceanside PD to determine who was behind the attack. Also, Franks visits his brother Mason (guest star Philip Winchester) at the compound, and Gibbs' relationship with Diane is tested when she gets a job in Los Angeles.(n)
当拉拉最喜欢的 CI 被枪杀时，团队与欧申赛德警察局联手查明袭击的幕后黑手。 此外，弗兰克斯在大院拜访了他的兄弟梅森（客串明星菲利普·温彻斯特饰），当黛安在洛杉矶找到工作时，吉布斯与她的关系受到了考验。

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 6)
扑打。 （第 6 季）
programme.desc: When Hicks insists SWAT participate in Patrol Day in an effort to engage more meaningfully with the community, Hondo and Deacon have their hands full mentoring the newest members of the team.(n)
当希克斯坚持要求特警参加巡逻日，以便更有意义地与社区互动时，洪多和迪肯正忙着指导团队的最新成员。(n)

programme.title: HUDSON & REX (SEASON 6)
哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: When a police officer is killed in the nightlife district, the case narrows on a group of Navy officers visiting from a ship led by Charlie's father, Commander Edward Hudson.(n)
当一名警察在夜生活区被杀时，案件范围缩小到一群海军军官从查理的父亲、指挥官爱德华·哈德森 (Edward Hudson) 率领的一艘船上来访。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：起源（第 2 季）
programme.desc: When Lala's favorite CI is shot, the team joins forces with Oceanside PD to determine who was behind the attack. Also, Franks visits his brother Mason (guest star Philip Winchester) at the compound, and Gibbs' relationship with Diane is tested when she gets a job in Los Angeles.(n)

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED (SEASON 5)
FBI：头号通缉犯（第 5 季）
programme.desc: After the Fugitive Task Force mobilizes to help apprehend an active shooter on a college campus in Queens, they find themselves in the middle of the glitzy world of college basketball. Also, Barnes and Charlotte attempt to work on their relationship.(n)
逃亡特遣队动员起来帮助逮捕皇后区一所大学校园内的一名活跃射手，他们发现自己置身于大学篮球的光鲜亮丽的世界之中。 此外，巴恩斯和夏洛特试图改善他们的关系。(n)

programme.title: DOC (SEASON 1)
文档（第一季）
programme.desc: When Chief of Internal Medicine Dr. Amy Larsen suffers a catastrophic brain injury, her life is turned upside down. Still, determined to once again practice medicine, she charts a new path forward, ready to face whatever obstacles stand in her way.(n)
当内科主任艾米·拉森医生遭受灾难性脑损伤时，她的生活发生了翻天覆地的变化。 尽管如此，她决心再次行医，绘制了一条新的前进道路，准备好面对前进道路上的任何障碍。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: SYDNEY (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：悉尼（第 2 季）
programme.desc: The suspicious death of a US Navy chorister draws NCIS: Sydney into the world of obsessive fans, pop stars, and earworms, as they learn how deadly the music business can be.(n)
一名美国海军唱诗班歌手的可疑死亡将《海军罪案调查处：悉尼》带入了由狂热歌迷、流行歌星和耳虫组成的世界，因为他们了解到音乐行业的致命性。(n)

programme.title: THE HUNTING PARTY (SEASON 1)
狩猎队（第一季）
programme.desc: Bex and the team hunt their most depraved serial killer yet, Tom Beecher, who seeks pleasure in other people's pain.(n)
贝克斯和团队追捕迄今为止最堕落的连环杀手汤姆·比彻 (Tom Beecher)，他从他人的痛苦中寻求快乐。(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 6)
扑打。 （第 6 季）
programme.desc: When classified information falls into the wrong hands, the team races to stop a dangerous plot targeting former members of the U.S. military.(n)
当机密信息落入坏人之手时，团队竞相阻止针对前美军成员的危险阴谋。(n)

当内科主任艾米·拉森医生遭受灾难性脑损伤时，她的生活发生了翻天覆地的变化。 尽管如此，她决心再次行医，绘制了一条新的前进道路，准备好面对前进道路上的任何障碍。(n)

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED (SEASON 5)
FBI：头号通缉犯（第 5 季）
programme.desc: After the Fugitive Task Force mobilizes to help apprehend an active shooter on a college campus in Queens, they find themselves in the middle of the glitzy world of college basketball. Also, Barnes and Charlotte attempt to work on their relationship.(n)
逃亡特遣队动员起来帮助逮捕皇后区一所大学校园内的一名活跃射手，他们发现自己置身于大学篮球的光鲜亮丽的世界之中。 此外，巴恩斯和夏洛特试图改善他们的关系。(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 6)
扑打。 （第 6 季）
programme.desc: When classified information falls into the wrong hands, the team races to stop a dangerous plot targeting former members of the U.S. military.(n)
当机密信息落入坏人之手时，团队竞相阻止针对前美军成员的危险阴谋。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: SYDNEY (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：悉尼（第 2 季）
programme.desc: The suspicious death of a US Navy chorister draws NCIS: Sydney into the world of obsessive fans, pop stars, and earworms, as they learn how deadly the music business can be.(n)
一名美国海军唱诗班歌手的可疑死亡将《海军罪案调查处：悉尼》带入了由狂热歌迷、流行歌星和耳虫组成的世界，因为他们了解到音乐行业的致命性。(n)

programme.title: THE ROOKIE: FEDS (SEASON 1)
新秀：联邦调查局（第一季）
programme.desc: After an internal investigation unit agent is drugged and buried alive in a desert outside of Vegas, the Feds director enlists Garza's unit to discreetly investigate.(n)
一名内部调查部门特工被下药并活埋在维加斯郊外的沙漠中后，联邦调查局局长邀请加尔萨的部门进行秘密调查。

programme.title: HUDSON & REX (SEASON 6)
哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: When a police officer is killed in the nightlife district, the case narrows on a group of Navy officers visiting from a ship led by Charlie's father, Commander Edward Hudson.(n)
当一名警察在夜生活区被杀时，案件范围缩小到一群海军军官从查理的父亲、指挥官爱德华·哈德森 (Edward Hudson) 率领的一艘船上来访。(n)

programme.title: HUDSON & REX (SEASON 6)
哈德森与雷克斯（第 6 季）
programme.desc: Charlie and Rex go undercover in prison to investigate the murder of David Aziz, a Robin Hood criminal Charlie arrested in the past.(n)
查理和雷克斯在监狱里卧底，调查大卫·阿齐兹的谋杀案，大卫·阿齐兹是查理过去被捕的罗宾汉罪犯。

programme.title: THE HUNTING PARTY (SEASON 1)
狩猎队（第一季）
programme.desc: Bex and the team hunt their most depraved serial killer yet, Tom Beecher, who seeks pleasure in other people's pain.(n)
贝克斯和团队追捕迄今为止最堕落的连环杀手汤姆·比彻 (Tom Beecher)，他从他人的痛苦中寻求快乐。(n)

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED (SEASON 5)
FBI：头号通缉犯（第 5 季）
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force springs into action after four detectives are shot dead during a prisoner exchange outside of a diner in New Jersey. Meanwhile, Remy struggles with having Corey as a roommate.(n)
四名侦探在新泽西州一家餐馆外的囚犯交换中被枪杀后，逃犯特遣部队立即采取行动。 与此同时，雷米却很难让科里成为室友。(n)

programme.title: DOC (SEASON 1)
文档（第一季）
programme.desc: While at the hospital recovering, Amy can't help but insert herself into her roommate's case. Meanwhile, all the other doctors and nurses have to adjust to the once formidable Chief now being the patient.(n)
在医院康复期间，艾米情不自禁地融入了室友的箱子里。 与此同时，所有其他医生和护士都必须适应曾经令人敬畏的酋长现在变成了病人。(n)

programme.title: NCIS: SYDNEY (SEASON 2)
海军罪案调查处：悉尼（第 2 季）
programme.desc: The discovery of an exsanguinated sailor takes NCIS: Sydney into the world of modern-day vampires, family feuds, bespoke vodka and a nocturnal matriarch with a penchant for blood.(n)
一名失血过多的水手的发现将《海军罪案调查处：悉尼》带入了现代吸血鬼、家庭恩怨、定制伏特加和嗜血成性的夜行女族长的世界。

programme.title: FBI (SEASON 6)
联邦调查局（第六季）
programme.desc: After the president of the NY Fed is gunned down trying to help a young woman in peril, the team races to find the killer and the missing woman.(n)
纽约联邦储备银行行长在试图帮助一名处于危险中的年轻女性时被枪杀，团队竞相寻找凶手和失踪的女性。(n)

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes (S3)
罗布森·格林的周末逍遥游（S3）
programme.desc: Robson is joined by Mark Benton for a weekend escape in the Scottish Borders.(n)
罗布森与马克·本顿一起在苏格兰边境度过了一个周末。(n)

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes (S3)
罗布森·格林的周末逍遥游（S3）
programme.desc: Emmerdale actor Laura Norton joins Robson for a Yorkshire Dales outing in the outdoors.(n)
艾默戴尔 (Emmerdale) 演员劳拉·诺顿 (Laura Norton) 与罗布森 (Robson) 一起去约克郡山谷 (Yorkshire Dales) 户外郊游。(n)

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather (S5)
世界上最致命的天气 (S5)
programme.desc: In the US a man and his dog take cover as a rare tornado outbreak rips through towns on the East coast. In Norway, a boxer has the fight of his life when a swim under the ice goes disastrously wrong and in Western Australia, a homeowner is in a faceoff with the flames.(n)
在美国，一场罕见的龙卷风席卷东海岸城镇，一名男子和他的狗躲了起来。 在挪威，一位拳击手在冰下游泳时发生了灾难性的错误，从而进行了一生的战斗；而在西澳大利亚，一位房主正与火焰对峙。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S4)
追逐怪物（S4）
programme.desc: Cyril is in the dangerous jungle of Gabon, West Africa, on a mission to catch a fanged predatory fish with a deadly bite and a brutally strong pull.(n)
西里尔在西非加蓬的危险丛林中，执行一项任务，捕捉一种具有致命咬合力和残酷强力拉力的尖牙掠食性鱼类。(n)

programme.title: Primates (S1)
灵长类动物（S1）
programme.desc: Revealing the extraordinary strategies monkeys, apes and lemurs use to survive in the most unexpected places, from snow-capped mountains to the open savannah.(n)
揭示猴子、猿和狐猴在最意想不到的地方（从白雪皑皑的山脉到开阔的大草原）生存所使用的非凡策略。(n)

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Gobi Desert with Nick Knowles (S1)
大冒险：与尼克·诺尔斯一起走进戈壁沙漠（S1）
programme.desc: Nick's first sight in the Gobi is truly awe-inspiring. Thundering towards him are the Namnaa horse archery academy.(n)
尼克在戈壁的第一眼所见确实令人惊叹。 纳姆纳射箭学院如雷霆般向他袭来。(n)

环游世界（S5）
programme.desc: The five pairs meet for the first time since returning home.(n)
五对回国后第一次见面。(n)

programme.title: Kingdom (S1)
王国 (S1)
programme.desc: Leopard Olimba finds a mate, but fortunes turn against the lions. Extreme flooding leads to disaster for the hyena clan, and the time has come for leopard Mutima to leave.(n)
豹奥林巴找到了伴侣，但命运却与狮子背道而驰。 极端洪水给鬣狗部落带来灾难，豹子穆蒂玛离开的时候到了。(n)

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1)
工程重生（S1）
programme.desc: See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World (S1)
乔安娜·拉姆利的世界大城市（S1）
programme.desc: Joanna's first view of Paris is from a hot air balloon, she visits the fire-damaged Notre-Dame, meets heiress Daphne Guinness, buys a vintage Chanel suit, and meets refugee turned beekeeper Ibrahim.(n)
乔安娜第一次看到巴黎是在热气球上，她参观了被大火损坏的巴黎圣母院，遇到了女继承人达芙妮·吉尼斯，购买了一套老式香奈儿套装，并遇到了难民出身的养蜂人易卜拉欣。

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes (S3)

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild (S4)
本·福格尔：重返荒野（S4）
programme.desc: Ben revisits his old friends Georg and Bettina, who live on a remote bogland in County Mayo. They found solace in the wilds of Ireland, but three years later, they are still weighing up options.(n)
本重访了他的老朋友乔治和贝蒂娜，他们住在梅奥郡的一个偏远沼泽地上。 他们在爱尔兰的荒野中找到了安慰，但三年后，他们仍在权衡选择。(n)

programme.title: Human (S1)
人类（S1）
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of how the human species, Homo sapiens, first emerged, where the discoveries of recent years are revolutionising the understanding of humanity's origin story.(n)
讲述人类——智人——如何首次出现的非凡故事，近年来的发现彻底改变了对人类起源故事的理解。(n)

programme.title: Spectacular Earth (S1)
壮观的地球（S1）
programme.desc: The largest of all of Earth's displays stretches across thousands of kilometres in the night sky: the Aurora Borealis. The arctic wilderness of Northern Sweden is one of the best places to see it.(n)
地球上最大的奇观在夜空中绵延数千公里：北极光。 瑞典北部的北极荒野是观赏它的最佳地点之一。(n)

艾默戴尔 (Emmerdale) 演员劳拉·诺顿 (Laura Norton) 与罗布森 (Robson) 一起去约克郡山谷 (Yorkshire Dales) 户外郊游。(n)

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild (S4)
本·福格尔：重返荒野（S4）
programme.desc: Ben revisits his old friends Georg and Bettina, who live on a remote bogland in County Mayo. They found solace in the wilds of Ireland, but three years later, they are still weighing up options.(n)
本重访了他的老朋友乔治和贝蒂娜，他们住在梅奥郡的一个偏远沼泽地上。 他们在爱尔兰的荒野中找到了安慰，但三年后，他们仍在权衡选择。(n)

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World (S1)
帕特里克·阿耶的狂野世界 (S1)
programme.desc: Join Patrick in the Great Plains of North America, as he explores the intricate web that connects grasses and dung beetles to bison and the grizzly bear.(n)
与帕特里克一起前往北美大平原，探索将草、粪甲虫与野牛和灰熊连接起来的错综复杂的网络。(n)

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Gobi Desert with Nick Knowles (S1)
大冒险：与尼克·诺尔斯一起走进戈壁沙漠（S1）
programme.desc: Nick's first sight in the Gobi is truly awe-inspiring. Thundering towards him are the Namnaa horse archery academy.(n)
尼克在戈壁的第一眼所见确实令人惊叹。 纳姆纳射箭学院如雷霆般向他袭来。(n)

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild (S4)
本·福格尔：重返荒野（S4）
programme.desc: Ben revisits his old friends Georg and Bettina, who live on a remote bogland in County Mayo. They found solace in the wilds of Ireland, but three years later, they are still weighing up options.(n)

programme.title: The Mating Game (S1)
交配游戏 (S1)
programme.desc: The strategies used by animals to find and defend their mates in the grasslands of Namibia, the Serengeti and Australia. Here, mating strategies are on show for all to see.(n)
纳米比亚、塞伦盖蒂和澳大利亚草原上动物寻找和保护配偶的策略。 在这里，交配策略向所有人展示。(n)

programme.title: Race Across the World (S5)
环游世界（S5）
programme.desc: The five pairs meet for the first time since returning home.(n)
五对回国后第一次见面。(n)

programme.title: Kingdom (S1)
王国 (S1)
programme.desc: Leopard Olimba finds a mate, but fortunes turn against the lions. Extreme flooding leads to disaster for the hyena clan, and the time has come for leopard Mutima to leave.(n)
豹奥林巴找到了伴侣，但命运却与狮子背道而驰。 极端洪水给鬣狗部落带来灾难，豹子穆蒂玛离开的时候到了。(n)

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1)
工程重生（S1）
programme.desc: See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.(n)
了解英国国家美术馆泰特美术馆如何介入帮助泰晤士河南岸的 Bankside。(n)

programme.title: Griff's Great American South (S1)
格里夫的伟大美国南方 (S1)
programme.desc: Griff dives into New Orleans' rich culture, jazz roots, vibrant food, and laid-back Southern soul.(n)
格里夫深入了解新奥尔良丰富的文化、爵士乐根源、充满活力的美食和悠闲的南方灵魂。(n)

programme.title: Kingdom (S1)
王国 (S1)
programme.desc: Injured wild dog Flint helps care for Storm's largest ever litter of pups. Leopard Mutima searches for a home, and the lions are challenged by forces beyond their control.(n)
受伤的野狗弗林特帮助照顾暴风女有史以来最大的一窝幼崽。 豹穆蒂玛寻找家园，狮子们受到超出其控制的力量的挑战。(n)

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong (S1)
中国野广东（S1）
programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.(n)
在广东北部，雄伟的山脉是众多令人眼花缭乱的野生动物的家园。 白鹇、中华穿山甲、黑鸢、中国大鲵和一种全新的洞穴壁虎。(n)

programme.title: Spectacular Earth (S1)
壮观的地球（S1）
programme.desc: The largest of all of Earth's displays stretches across thousands of kilometres in the night sky: the Aurora Borealis. The arctic wilderness of Northern Sweden is one of the best places to see it.(n)
地球上最大的奇观在夜空中绵延数千公里：北极光。 瑞典北部的北极荒野是观赏它的最佳地点之一。(n)

programme.title: Amazing Railway Adventures with Nick Knowles (S2)
尼克·诺尔斯的奇妙铁路冒险 (S2)
programme.desc: Nick's train leaves from Tangier and it's a special one; Al Boraq, which speeds along the high-speed line making its way down the west coast. At its fastest Al Boraq reaches nearly 200 mph and is run entirely on wind power. The ambition is to run Morocco's entire railway system on green energy within the next two years.(n)
尼克的火车从丹吉尔出发，这是一辆特别的火车； Al Boraq，沿着高速线沿着西海岸行驶。 Al Boraq 最快时速可达近 200 英里/小时，完全依靠风力发电。 目标是在未来两年内使摩洛哥的整个铁路系统都采用绿色能源运行。(n)

programme.title: Kingdom (S1)
王国 (S1)
programme.desc: Injured wild dog Flint helps care for Storm's largest ever litter of pups. Leopard Mutima searches for a home, and the lions are challenged by forces beyond their control.(n)

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather (S5)
世界上最致命的天气 (S5)
programme.desc: In the US a man and his dog take cover as a rare tornado outbreak rips through towns on the East coast. In Norway, a boxer has the fight of his life when a swim under the ice goes disastrously wrong and in Western Australia, a homeowner is in a faceoff with the flames.(n)
在美国，一场罕见的龙卷风席卷东海岸城镇，一名男子和他的狗躲了起来。 在挪威，一位拳击手在冰下游泳时发生了灾难性的错误，从而进行了一生的战斗；而在西澳大利亚，一位房主正与火焰对峙。(n)

programme.title: Primates (S1)
灵长类动物（S1）
programme.desc: Revealing the extraordinary strategies monkeys, apes and lemurs use to survive in the most unexpected places, from snow-capped mountains to the open savannah.(n)
揭示猴子、猿和狐猴在最意想不到的地方（从白雪皑皑的山脉到开阔的大草原）生存所使用的非凡策略。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S4)
追逐怪物（S4）
programme.desc: Cyril is in the dangerous jungle of Gabon, West Africa, on a mission to catch a fanged predatory fish with a deadly bite and a brutally strong pull.(n)
西里尔在西非加蓬的危险丛林中，执行一项任务，捕捉一种具有致命咬合力和残酷强力拉力的尖牙掠食性鱼类。(n)

programme.title: Asia (S1)
亚洲（S1）
programme.desc: In the planet's most densely populated continent, animals live at extremely close quarters with people, from tigers making a home in town to elephants stopping traffic for food.(n)
在地球上人口最稠密的大陆上，动物与人类生活的距离非常近，从在城里安家的老虎到拦截交通寻找食物的大象。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Adventurer Cyril Chauquet seeks out the most colossal and dangerous underwater creatures in the world. Cyril heads to Polynesia to catch a legendary fish known to the locals as the Uruati, but he isn't prepared for the incredible number of sharks lurking below the waters.(n)
冒险家西里尔·肖盖 (Cyril Chauquet) 寻找世界上最巨大、最危险的水下生物。 西里尔前往波利尼西亚捕捉一种被当地人称为乌鲁提鱼的传奇鱼，但他对潜伏在水下的大量鲨鱼毫无准备。(n)

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family (S1)
野外的狗：与家人见面（S1）
programme.desc: The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.(n)
犬科动物成功的秘诀及其令人难以置信的生存策略，从跳跃的豺狼到打喷嚏的非洲野狗，以及爬树的灰狐。(n)

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1)
格里夫的加拿大冒险 (S1)
programme.desc: Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose.(n)
格里夫·里斯·琼斯 (Griff Rhys Jones) 在纽芬兰开始了他的加拿大之旅，在那里他寻找驼鹿。(n)

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life (S1)
现代生活的秘密天才（S1）
programme.desc: Hannah Fry reveals the miraculous technologies that define the modern world.(n)
汉娜·弗莱 (Hannah Fry) 揭示了定义现代世界的神奇技术。(n)

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong (S1)
中国野广东（S1）
programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.(n)
在广东北部，雄伟的山脉是众多令人眼花缭乱的野生动物的家园。 白鹇、中华穿山甲、黑鸢、中国大鲵和一种全新的洞穴壁虎。(n)

programme.title: Hippo Watch with Steve Backshall (S1)
史蒂夫·巴克歇尔 (Steve Backshall) 观看河马手表 (S1)
programme.desc: Having learnt where a hippos aggression comes from Steve wants to find out if we can live alongside the animal that kills up to 500 people a year. He visits St.Lucia, a town where hippos roam the streets freely at night, feeding on the manicured lawns and bushes of the townsfolk. In order to see them out of the water he must come back at night.(n)
了解了河马的攻击性从何而来后，史蒂夫想知道我们是否可以与这种每年杀死多达 500 人的动物共存。 他参观了圣卢西亚小镇，晚上河马在街道上自由漫步，以镇民修剪整齐的草坪和灌木丛为食。 为了把他们从水里救出来，他必须晚上回来。(n)

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong (S1)

programme.title: Asia (S1)
亚洲（S1）
programme.desc: In the heart of Asia lie vast arid lands. These deserts and dry grasslands are so hostile, they push life to the limit. The animals that live here are some of the earth's toughest.(n)
亚洲的中心地带有广阔的干旱土地。 这些沙漠和干燥的草原是如此充满敌意，它们将生命推向极限。 生活在这里的动物是地球上最顽强的动物。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Adventurer Cyril Chauquet seeks out the most colossal and dangerous underwater creatures in the world. Stranded on a deserted island off the west coast of Panama, Cyril and his team are in survival mode. Cyril is trying to catch a huge Dienton, a large predator with huge teeth.(n)
冒险家西里尔·肖盖 (Cyril Chauquet) 寻找世界上最巨大、最危险的水下生物。 西里尔和他的团队被困在巴拿马西海岸的一个荒岛上，处于生存模式。 西里尔正试图捕捉一只巨大的迪恩顿，这是一种长着巨大牙齿的大型掠食者。(n)

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World (S1)
帕特里克·阿耶的狂野世界 (S1)
programme.desc: Patrick is in British Columbia to observe the annual salmon run, which plays a crucial role in ensuring the species' survival while also sustaining the entire rainforest ecosystem.(n)
帕特里克在不列颠哥伦比亚省观察一年一度的鲑鱼洄游，这对于确保该物种的生存和维持整个雨林生态系统发挥着至关重要的作用。(n)

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Gobi Desert with Nick Knowles (S1)
大冒险：与尼克·诺尔斯一起走进戈壁沙漠（S1）
programme.desc: In the second part of Nick Knowles' remarkable Mongolian adventure Nick heads to The Nadaam Festival, a vibrant celebration of the ancient skills that were once required to become a warrior.(n)
在尼克·诺尔斯非凡的蒙古冒险的第二部分中，尼克前往那达慕节，这是一场充满活力的庆祝活动，庆祝曾经成为战士所需的古老技能。(n)

programme.title: Ancient Powers (S1)
远古力量 (S1)
programme.desc: In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?(n)
在一个难以驾驭的世界里，我们古老的力量必须领导他们的人民，创造治理方式并遏制叛乱。 谁能找到正确的统治方式？(n)

programme.title: Amazing Railway Adventures with Nick Knowles (S2)
尼克·诺尔斯的奇妙铁路冒险 (S2)
programme.desc: Nick's train leaves from Tangier and it's a special one; Al Boraq, which speeds along the high-speed line making its way down the west coast. At its fastest Al Boraq reaches nearly 200 mph and is run entirely on wind power. The ambition is to run Morocco's entire railway system on green energy within the next two years.(n)
尼克的火车从丹吉尔出发，这是一辆特别的火车； Al Boraq，沿着高速线沿着西海岸行驶。 Al Boraq 最快时速可达近 200 英里/小时，完全依靠风力发电。 目标是在未来两年内使摩洛哥的整个铁路系统都采用绿色能源运行。(n)

格里夫·里斯·琼斯 (Griff Rhys Jones) 在纽芬兰开始了他的加拿大之旅，在那里他寻找驼鹿。(n)

programme.title: Ancient Powers (S1)
远古力量 (S1)
programme.desc: In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?(n)
在一个难以驾驭的世界里，我们古老的力量必须领导他们的人民，创造治理方式并遏制叛乱。 谁能找到正确的统治方式？(n)

programme.title: Asia (S1)
亚洲（S1）
programme.desc: Many passionate people are dedicated to saving the wild animals of Asia. These individuals and their ingenious solutions give us hope and optimism for the future of the continent.(n)
许多热心人士致力于拯救亚洲的野生动物。 这些人和他们巧妙的解决方案给我们带来了对非洲大陆未来的希望和乐观。(n)

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World (S1)
帕特里克·阿耶的狂野世界 (S1)
programme.desc: Patrick is in British Columbia to observe the annual salmon run, which plays a crucial role in ensuring the species' survival while also sustaining the entire rainforest ecosystem.(n)
帕特里克在不列颠哥伦比亚省观察一年一度的鲑鱼洄游，这对于确保该物种的生存和维持整个雨林生态系统发挥着至关重要的作用。(n)

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1)
格里夫的加拿大冒险 (S1)
programme.desc: Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose.(n)
格里夫·里斯·琼斯 (Griff Rhys Jones) 在纽芬兰开始了他的加拿大之旅，在那里他寻找驼鹿。(n)

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Gobi Desert with Nick Knowles (S1)
大冒险：与尼克·诺尔斯一起走进戈壁沙漠（S1）
programme.desc: In the second part of Nick Knowles' remarkable Mongolian adventure Nick heads to The Nadaam Festival, a vibrant celebration of the ancient skills that were once required to become a warrior.(n)
在尼克·诺尔斯非凡的蒙古冒险的第二部分中，尼克前往那达慕节，这是一场充满活力的庆祝活动，庆祝曾经成为战士所需的古老技能。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Adventurer Cyril Chauquet seeks out the most colossal and dangerous underwater creatures in the world. Stranded on a deserted island off the west coast of Panama, Cyril and his team are in survival mode. Cyril is trying to catch a huge Dienton, a large predator with huge teeth.(n)
冒险家西里尔·肖盖 (Cyril Chauquet) 寻找世界上最巨大、最危险的水下生物。 西里尔和他的团队被困在巴拿马西海岸的一个荒岛上，处于生存模式。 西里尔正试图捕捉一只巨大的迪恩顿，这是一种长着巨大牙齿的大型掠食者。(n)

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World (S1)
帕特里克·阿耶的狂野世界 (S1)
programme.desc: Patrick is in British Columbia to observe the annual salmon run, which plays a crucial role in ensuring the species' survival while also sustaining the entire rainforest ecosystem.(n)
帕特里克在不列颠哥伦比亚省观察一年一度的鲑鱼洄游，这对于确保该物种的生存和维持整个雨林生态系统发挥着至关重要的作用。(n)

programme.title: Ancient Powers (S1)
远古力量 (S1)
programme.desc: In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?(n)
在一个难以驾驭的世界里，我们古老的力量必须领导他们的人民，创造治理方式并遏制叛乱。 谁能找到正确的统治方式？(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: In central Africa, Cyril must remain on high alert, especially from his small tippy dugout. In order to find the elusive giant Barracuda he's after, a 100 lb and six foot torpedo, he will have to venture very far into a hostile jungle and fish watersteeming with Bull Sharks.(n)
在中部非洲，西里尔必须保持高度警惕，尤其是在他那小而尖的防空洞里。 为了找到他所追寻的难以捉摸的巨型梭鱼，这是一枚重 100 磅、六英尺的鱼雷，他必须冒险深入敌对的丛林，并与公牛鲨一起在水中捕鱼。

programme.title: Kingdom (S1)
王国 (S1)
programme.desc: Injured wild dog Flint helps care for Storm's largest ever litter of pups. Leopard Mutima searches for a home, and the lions are challenged by forces beyond their control.(n)
受伤的野狗弗林特帮助照顾暴风女有史以来最大的一窝幼崽。 豹穆蒂玛寻找家园，狮子们受到超出其控制的力量的挑战。(n)

programme.title: Amazing Railway Adventures with Nick Knowles (S2)
尼克·诺尔斯的奇妙铁路冒险 (S2)
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels from the Alps to the Adriatic in another entertaining railway adventure as he journeys by train through the breath-taking scenery of Slovenia and Croatia.(n)
尼克·诺尔斯 (Nick Knowles) 乘坐火车穿越斯洛文尼亚和克罗地亚令人惊叹的风景，从阿尔卑斯山前往亚得里亚海，踏上另一场有趣的铁路冒险之旅。

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild (S4)
本·福格尔：重返荒野（S4）
programme.desc: Ben makes an unprecedented third visit to see his old friends Bill and Bob, elderly twins living in the canyons of Utah, and realises that their paranoia about the outside world has grown.(n)
本史无前例地第三次拜访他的老朋友比尔和鲍勃，这对住在犹他州峡谷的年长双胞胎，并意识到他们对外部世界的偏执已经增长。

programme.title: Blue Planet II (S2)
蓝色星球II (S2)
programme.desc: From tropical coral reefs to chilly Norwegian fjords, this episode reveals new worlds and extraordinary never-before-seen animal behaviours.(n)
从热带珊瑚礁到寒冷的挪威峡湾，这一集揭示了新的世界和前所未见的非凡动物行为。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Swept away in the ice cold rapids in Northern Canada, Cyril is on the verge of hypothermia. He is in the northern reaches of the Cree First Nations territory to catch a mythical predator; a ferocious fish referred to as the freshwater wolf.(n)
西里尔被加拿大北部冰冷的急流冲走，正处于体温过低的边缘。 他在克里族原住民领地的北部地区捕捉神秘的掠食者； 一种被称为淡水狼的凶猛鱼。(n)

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong (S1)
中国野广东（S1）
programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.(n)
在广东北部，雄伟的山脉是众多令人眼花缭乱的野生动物的家园。 白鹇、中华穿山甲、黑鸢、中国大鲵和一种全新的洞穴壁虎。(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World (S1)
乔安娜·拉姆利的世界大城市（S1）
programme.desc: Joanna's visit to Rome includes the Trevi Fountain, a meeting with a famous paparazzo, and the privilege of unlocking the Sistine Chapel with its single key.(n)
乔安娜的罗马之行包括参观特莱维喷泉、与著名狗仔队的会面，以及用一把钥匙打开西斯廷教堂的特权。(n)

programme.title: Human (S1)
人类（S1）
programme.desc: Following early Homo sapiens ancestors as they step out of Africa and venture into the wider world, heading into areas inhabited by other human species.(n)
跟随早期智人祖先走出非洲，冒险进入更广阔的世界，进入其他人类物种居住的地区。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Swept away in the ice cold rapids in Northern Canada, Cyril is on the verge of hypothermia. He is in the northern reaches of the Cree First Nations territory to catch a mythical predator; a ferocious fish referred to as the freshwater wolf.(n)

中国野广东（S1）
programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.(n)
在广东北部，雄伟的山脉是众多令人眼花缭乱的野生动物的家园。 白鹇、中华穿山甲、黑鸢、中国大鲵和一种全新的洞穴壁虎。(n)

programme.title: Human (S1)
人类（S1）
programme.desc: Following early Homo sapiens ancestors as they step out of Africa and venture into the wider world, heading into areas inhabited by other human species.(n)
跟随早期智人祖先走出非洲，冒险进入更广阔的世界，进入其他人类物种居住的地区。(n)

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong (S1)
中国野广东（S1）
programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.(n)
在广东北部，雄伟的山脉是众多令人眼花缭乱的野生动物的家园。 白鹇、中华穿山甲、黑鸢、中国大鲵和一种全新的洞穴壁虎。(n)

programme.title: Ancient Powers (S1)
远古力量 (S1)
programme.desc: In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?(n)
在一个难以驾驭的世界里，我们古老的力量必须领导他们的人民，创造治理方式并遏制叛乱。 谁能找到正确的统治方式？(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Swept away in the ice cold rapids in Northern Canada, Cyril is on the verge of hypothermia. He is in the northern reaches of the Cree First Nations territory to catch a mythical predator; a ferocious fish referred to as the freshwater wolf.(n)
西里尔被加拿大北部冰冷的急流冲走，正处于体温过低的边缘。 他在克里族原住民领地的北部地区捕捉神秘的掠食者； 一种被称为淡水狼的凶猛鱼。(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World (S1)
乔安娜·拉姆利的世界大城市（S1）
programme.desc: Joanna's visit to Rome includes the Trevi Fountain, a meeting with a famous paparazzo, and the privilege of unlocking the Sistine Chapel with its single key.(n)
乔安娜的罗马之行包括参观特莱维喷泉、与著名狗仔队的会面，以及用一把钥匙打开西斯廷教堂的特权。(n)

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong (S1)
中国野广东（S1）
programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.(n)

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1)
格里夫的加拿大冒险 (S1)
programme.desc: Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose.(n)
格里夫·里斯·琼斯 (Griff Rhys Jones) 在纽芬兰开始了他的加拿大之旅，在那里他寻找驼鹿。(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World (S1)
乔安娜·拉姆利的世界大城市（S1）
programme.desc: Joanna's visit to Rome includes the Trevi Fountain, a meeting with a famous paparazzo, and the privilege of unlocking the Sistine Chapel with its single key.(n)
乔安娜的罗马之行包括参观特莱维喷泉、与著名狗仔队的会面，以及用一把钥匙打开西斯廷教堂的特权。(n)

programme.title: Blue Planet II (S2)
蓝色星球II (S2)
programme.desc: A ground-breaking journey to the Deep, our final frontier and home to real-life aliens; from monstrous sharks to shrimps in glass cages and perhaps the origin of all life on Earth.(n)
前往深海的开创性旅程，深海是我们最后的边疆，也是现实生活中外星人的家园； 从巨大的鲨鱼到玻璃笼子里的虾，也许还有地球上所有生命的起源。(n)

programme.title: Ancient Powers (S1)
远古力量 (S1)
programme.desc: In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?(n)
在一个难以驾驭的世界里，我们古老的力量必须领导他们的人民，创造治理方式并遏制叛乱。 谁能找到正确的统治方式？(n)

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1)
工程重生（S1）
programme.desc: Discover how the St Louis Rail Station went from being the biggest in the United States to falling into disrepair.(n)
了解圣路易斯火车站是如何从美国最大的火车站变成年久失修的。(n)

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild (S4)
本·福格尔：重返荒野（S4）
programme.desc: Ben makes an unprecedented third visit to see his old friends Bill and Bob, elderly twins living in the canyons of Utah, and realises that their paranoia about the outside world has grown.(n)
本史无前例地第三次拜访他的老朋友比尔和鲍勃，这对住在犹他州峡谷的年长双胞胎，并意识到他们对外部世界的偏执已经增长。

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Swept away in the ice cold rapids in Northern Canada, Cyril is on the verge of hypothermia. He is in the northern reaches of the Cree First Nations territory to catch a mythical predator; a ferocious fish referred to as the freshwater wolf.(n)
西里尔被加拿大北部冰冷的急流冲走，正处于体温过低的边缘。 他在克里族原住民领地的北部地区捕捉神秘的掠食者； 一种被称为淡水狼的凶猛鱼。(n)

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World (S1)
帕特里克·阿耶的狂野世界 (S1)
programme.desc: Patrick is in British Columbia to observe the annual salmon run, which plays a crucial role in ensuring the species' survival while also sustaining the entire rainforest ecosystem.(n)
帕特里克在不列颠哥伦比亚省观察一年一度的鲑鱼洄游，这对于确保该物种的生存和维持整个雨林生态系统发挥着至关重要的作用。(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World (S1)
乔安娜·拉姆利的世界大城市（S1）
programme.desc: Joanna's visit to Rome includes the Trevi Fountain, a meeting with a famous paparazzo, and the privilege of unlocking the Sistine Chapel with its single key.(n)
乔安娜的罗马之行包括参观特莱维喷泉、与著名狗仔队的会面，以及用一把钥匙打开西斯廷教堂的特权。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Cyril's after a huge Aymara. Weighing in at 100lb, this fierce ambush predator is capable of snapping piranhas in half or swallowing them whole.(n)
西里尔正在寻找一个巨大的艾马拉人。 这种凶猛的伏击掠食者重达 100 磅，能够将食人鱼撕成两半或将其整个吞下。(n)

programme.title: Primates (S1)
灵长类动物（S1）
programme.desc: For primates, family is everything. Complex social lives are key to their success.(n)
对于灵长类动物来说，家庭就是一切。 复杂的社交生活是他们成功的关键。(n)

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes (S3)
罗布森·格林的周末逍遥游（S3）
programme.desc: Former world and Olympic champion Nicola Adams joins Robson to enjoy the great outdoors.(n)
前世界冠军和奥运会冠军尼古拉·亚当斯 (Nicola Adams) 与罗布森 (Robson) 一起享受户外活动。(n)

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes (S3)
罗布森·格林的周末逍遥游（S3）
programme.desc: Comedian Rosie Jones shares her childhood haunts with Robson in North Yorkshire.(n)
喜剧演员罗西·琼斯与罗布森在北约克郡分享了她的童年时光。(n)

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather (S5)
世界上最致命的天气 (S5)
programme.desc: In Germany, floods tear through central European towns and villages. In Nepal a landslide threatens local communities. In California, wildfires tear through the states forests and farms.(n)
在德国，洪水席卷了中欧城镇和村庄。 在尼泊尔，山体滑坡威胁着当地社区。 在加利福尼亚州，野火席卷了该州的森林和农场。(n)

programme.title: Chasing Monsters (S5)
追逐怪物（S5）
programme.desc: Cyril's after a huge Aymara. Weighing in at 100lb, this fierce ambush predator is capable of snapping piranhas in half or swallowing them whole.(n)
西里尔正在寻找一个巨大的艾马拉人。 这种凶猛的伏击掠食者重达 100 磅，能够将食人鱼撕成两半或将其整个吞下。(n)

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious (S1)
世界最奢华 (S1)
programme.desc: Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious private jets.(n)
加入我们，我们每周都会看看不同的奢侈品世界。 在本集中，我们将一睹世界上最豪华的私人飞机的内部。(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make (S1)
吉诺的意大利：就像妈妈以前做的那样（S1）
programme.desc: Gino is back exploring Tuscany - he visits a wheat farm, learns about Tuscan food traditions, goes to work at a vineyard and tastes some fine wine.(n)
吉诺回来探索托斯卡纳 - 他参观了小麦农场，了解了托斯卡纳的饮食传统，去葡萄园工作并品尝了一些上等葡萄酒。(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1)
Rachel Khoo 的巧克力 (S1)
programme.desc: Rachel explores chocolate's versatility. She mixes it with savoury in a polpette penne, and in Stockholm she learns about pairing drink with chocolate.(n)
雷切尔探索巧克力的多功能性。 她将其与咸味混合在 polpette penne 中，并在斯德哥尔摩学习了如何将饮料与巧克力搭配。(n)

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S2)
完美的家 (S2)
programme.desc: Rachel and Mike were thrilled when they found a reasonably priced, spacious home in which to raise their children. It didn't take long living in it to discover its flaws.(n)
当雷切尔和迈克找到一套价格合理、宽敞的房子来抚养孩子时，他们非常兴奋。 在里面生活没多久就发现了它的缺陷。(n)

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job (S2)
阿曼达和艾伦的意大利工作（S2）
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan divide and conquer as they renovate the bathrooms. Amanda has big plans for converting one of the medieval tower rooms into a double-height sumptuous en-suite.(n)
阿曼达和艾伦在装修浴室时分而治之。 阿曼达有一个宏伟的计划，要将其中一间中世纪塔楼房间改造成双层高的豪华套房。(n)

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job (S2)
阿曼达和艾伦的意大利工作（S2）
programme.desc: Amanda meets her match as she aims to turn the dark second bedroom into a country-chic boudoir, inspired by the Tuscan sunrise.(n)
阿曼达遇到了她的对手，她的目标是把黑暗的第二间卧室变成乡村别致的闺房，灵感来自托斯卡纳日出。(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs (S21)
宏伟设计 (S21)
programme.desc: In 2017, Leigh and Richard bought a derelict Cornish flour mill to restore and turn into their home. By 2021, rooms and landscaping were still unfinished.(n)
2017 年，Leigh 和 Richard 购买了一家废弃的康沃尔面粉厂，将其修复并改造成他们的家。 到 2021 年，房间和景观仍未完工。(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1)

programme.desc: Rachel explores chocolate's versatility. She mixes it with savoury in a polpette penne, and in Stockholm she learns about pairing drink with chocolate.(n)

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes (S2)
贾森阿瑟顿的迪拜菜肴（S2）
programme.desc: Jason is on the beach in the coastal area of Jumeirah to delve into the art of pickling.(n)
Jason 在朱美拉沿海地区的海滩上钻研腌制艺术。(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make (S1)
吉诺的意大利：就像妈妈以前做的那样（S1）
programme.desc: Gino is back exploring Tuscany - he visits a wheat farm, learns about Tuscan food traditions, goes to work at a vineyard and tastes some fine wine.(n)

programme.title: Guillaume's Paris (S1)
纪尧姆的巴黎 (S1)
programme.desc: Guillaume Brahimi explores the 11th and 12th arrondissements of Paris; Guillaume visits the chocolate factory of Alain Ducasse.(n)
Guillaume Brahimi 探索巴黎第 11 区和第 12 区； 纪尧姆参观阿兰·杜卡斯的巧克力工厂。(n)

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat (S3)
非凡的用餐场所（S3）
programme.desc: Dermot O'Leary treats Fred to Puglia's sublime cucina povera, as they sample seafood at Il Bastione, enjoy pasta perfection at Masseria Le Stanzie and embrace a coccolare at Gustavo's.(n)
德莫特·奥利里 (Dermot O'Leary) 招待弗雷德 (Fred) 享用普利亚 (Puglia) 的美味 cucina povera，他们在 Il Bastione 品尝海鲜，在 Masseria Le Stanzie 享用完美的意大利面，并在 Gustavo's 品尝可可拉 (coccolare)。(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1)
Rachel Khoo 的巧克力 (S1)
programme.desc: Rachel explores chocolate's versatility. She mixes it with savoury in a polpette penne, and in Stockholm she learns about pairing drink with chocolate.(n)
雷切尔探索巧克力的多功能性。 她将其与咸味混合在 polpette penne 中，并在斯德哥尔摩学习了如何将饮料与巧克力搭配。(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2)
里克斯坦的康沃尔 (S2)
programme.desc: Rick braves the notoriously wild Atlantic waters to learn about the ancient fishing method of handlining at Sennen Cove off Land's End. The catch of the day is some deliciously plump pollock, which Rick uses to make the ultimate fish pie for the head gardener of Tresillian House, John Harris.(n)
瑞克勇敢地面对臭名昭著的狂野大西洋水域，在天涯海角附近的森南湾 (Sennen Cove) 学习手工捕鱼的古老方法。 当天捕获的鱼是一些美味肥美的鳕鱼，瑞克用它为 Tresillian House 的首席园丁约翰·哈里斯 (John Harris) 制作了终极鱼饼。(n)

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook (S1)
多纳尔·斯凯汉：家庭厨师（S1）
programme.desc: Donal shows us how to create his festive show-stoppers, including a spiced pear sticky toffee cake with maple and rum drizzle and sweet spiced loaves.(n)
多纳尔向我们展示了如何制作他的节日亮点，包括带有枫糖和朗姆酒细雨的五香梨粘太妃糖蛋糕以及甜香料面包。(n)

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S5)
精彩酒店：大堂之外的生活（S5）
programme.desc: Monica and Rob work behind the scenes of a hotel built to resemble an entire ancient Italian village. They discover how you deliver real Italy within a carefully designed replica.(n)
莫妮卡和罗布在一家仿照整个意大利古老村庄建造的酒店的幕后工作。 他们发现如何在精心设计的复制品中呈现真正的意大利。(n)

programme.title: Mary Berry Makes It Easy (S1)
玛丽·贝瑞让一切变得简单 (S1)
programme.desc: Mary joins Michael Ball on stage in the West End to teach him some new and exciting recipes - ideal for a keen cook who wants to be a little more adventurous.(n)
玛丽与迈克尔·鲍尔一起登上西区的舞台，教他一些令人兴奋的新食谱 - 对于想要更具冒险精神的热衷厨师来说是理想的选择。(n)

精彩酒店：大堂之外的生活（S5）
programme.desc: Monica Galetti and Rob Rinder discover Glenapp Castle, where guests are treated to a magical stay that is both rugged and luxurious - and thoroughly Scottish.(n)
莫妮卡·加莱蒂 (Monica Galetti) 和罗布·林德 (Rob Rinder) 探索格伦纳普城堡 (Glenapp Castle)，客人可以在这里享受既粗犷又豪华的神奇住宿体验，而且完全是苏格兰风格。(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S16)
伟大的英国烘焙大赛 (S16)
programme.desc: The bakers make a pull-apart monkey bread Signature, a fast food Technical and a tiered sweet bread Showstopper. Who'll rise to the top, and who kneads to dust themselves off?(n)
面包师制作了 Signature 猴面包、快餐 Technical 面包和分层甜面包 Showstopper。 谁会登上顶峰，谁会揉捏身上的灰尘？(n)

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show (S33)
格雷厄姆·诺顿秀 (S33)
programme.desc: Graham Norton presents a lively chat show featuring Glenn Close, Alexander Skarsgård, Miriam Margolyes, Nicola Coughlan and Jessie J.(n)
格雷厄姆·诺顿为格伦·克洛斯、亚历山大·斯卡斯加德、米里亚姆·玛戈莱斯、尼古拉·考夫兰和杰西·J 带来了一场生动的脱口秀。

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook (S1)
多纳尔·斯凯汉：家庭厨师（S1）
programme.desc: Donal shows us how to create his festive show-stoppers, including a spiced pear sticky toffee cake with maple and rum drizzle and sweet spiced loaves.(n)
多纳尔向我们展示了如何制作他的节日亮点，包括带有枫糖和朗姆酒细雨的五香梨粘太妃糖蛋糕以及甜香料面包。(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1)
吉诺的意大利家庭冒险（S1）
programme.desc: After a boat trip to the stunning Maddalena islands for lunch, Gino and the family prepare a sumptuous Italian Christmas feast.(n)
乘船前往迷人的马达莱纳群岛享用午餐后，吉诺和家人准备了丰盛的意大利圣诞大餐。(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1)
吉诺的意大利家庭冒险（S1）
programme.desc: After a boat trip to the stunning Maddalena islands for lunch, Gino and the family prepare a sumptuous Italian Christmas feast.(n)
乘船前往迷人的马达莱纳群岛享用午餐后，吉诺和家人准备了丰盛的意大利圣诞大餐。(n)

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S2)
完美的家 (S2)
programme.desc: Rachel and Mike were thrilled when they found a reasonably priced, spacious home in which to raise their children. It didn't take long living in it to discover its flaws.(n)
当雷切尔和迈克找到一套价格合理、宽敞的房子来抚养孩子时，他们非常兴奋。 在里面生活没多久就发现了它的缺陷。(n)

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job (S2)
阿曼达和艾伦的意大利工作（S2）
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan divide and conquer as they renovate the bathrooms. Amanda has big plans for converting one of the medieval tower rooms into a double-height sumptuous en-suite.(n)
阿曼达和艾伦在装修浴室时分而治之。 阿曼达有一个宏伟的计划，要将其中一间中世纪塔楼房间改造成双层高的豪华套房。(n)

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job (S2)
阿曼达和艾伦的意大利工作（S2）
programme.desc: Amanda meets her match as she aims to turn the dark second bedroom into a country-chic boudoir, inspired by the Tuscan sunrise.(n)
阿曼达遇到了她的对手，她的目标是把黑暗的第二间卧室变成乡村别致的闺房，灵感来自托斯卡纳日出。(n)

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious (S1)
世界最奢华 (S1)
programme.desc: Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode, we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious homes.(n)
加入我们，我们每周都会看看不同的奢侈品世界。 在这一集中，我们将一睹世界上最豪华的住宅的内部。(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S16)
伟大的英国烘焙大赛 (S16)
programme.desc: The bakers make a pull-apart monkey bread Signature, a fast food Technical and a tiered sweet bread Showstopper. Who'll rise to the top, and who kneads to dust themselves off?(n)
面包师制作了 Signature 猴面包、快餐 Technical 面包和分层甜面包 Showstopper。 谁会登上顶峰，谁会揉捏身上的灰尘？(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South (S1)
吉诺的意大利：南方的秘密（S1）
programme.desc: A festive ending to the series, Gino uncovers the tasty food and Christmas traditions the South of Italy has to offer. He visits Scolastica Market in Bari to pick up some local ingredients with which to cook the perfect Italian Christmas feast.(n)
作为该系列的节日结局，吉诺揭示了意大利南部的美味佳肴和圣诞传统。 他参观了巴里的 Scolastica 市场，挑选了一些当地食材来烹饪完美的意大利圣诞大餐。(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1)
吉诺的意大利家庭冒险（S1）
programme.desc: After a boat trip to the stunning Maddalena islands for lunch, Gino and the family prepare a sumptuous Italian Christmas feast.(n)
乘船前往迷人的马达莱纳群岛享用午餐后，吉诺和家人准备了丰盛的意大利圣诞大餐。(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs (S21)
宏伟设计 (S21)
programme.desc: In 2017, Leigh and Richard bought a derelict Cornish flour mill to restore and turn into their home. By 2021, rooms and landscaping were still unfinished.(n)
2017 年，Leigh 和 Richard 购买了一家废弃的康沃尔面粉厂，将其修复并改造成他们的家。 到 2021 年，房间和景观仍未完工。(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S8)
乔治克拉克的老房子新家（S8）
programme.desc: George tackles a cottage conundrum to solve traipsing through its only bedroom to get to its only bathroom. And will a couple's plans to turn their loft into a cinema turn out to be a horror show?(n)
乔治解决了一个小屋难题，解决了穿过唯一的卧室到达唯一的浴室的问题。 一对夫妇将他们的阁楼改造成电影院的计划会变成一场恐怖表演吗？(n)

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes (S2)
贾森阿瑟顿的迪拜菜肴（S2）
programme.desc: Jason is on the beach in the coastal area of Jumeirah to delve into the art of pickling.(n)
Jason 在朱美拉沿海地区的海滩上钻研腌制艺术。(n)

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job (S2)
阿曼达和艾伦的意大利工作（S2）
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan divide and conquer as they renovate the bathrooms. Amanda has big plans for converting one of the medieval tower rooms into a double-height sumptuous en-suite.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs (S21)
宏伟设计 (S21)
programme.desc: In 2017, Leigh and Richard bought a derelict Cornish flour mill to restore and turn into their home. By 2021, rooms and landscaping were still unfinished.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less (S1)
杰米·奥利弗：少花钱做饭（S1）
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how to make great dishes from frozen food. Jamie makes a sumptuous frozen fish Pie, a one pan spicy chicken dish and creamy frozen cauliflower spaghetti. Jamie introduces a great dish for batch cooking, Minestrone soup and cheesy garlic bread and ends with a microwave chocolate pudding.(n)
杰米演示如何用冷冻食品制作美味佳肴。 杰米制作了丰盛的冷冻鱼馅饼、一锅辣鸡肉菜肴和奶油冷冻花椰菜意大利面。 杰米介绍了一道适合批量烹饪的美味佳肴：通心粉汤和奶酪大蒜面包，最后是微波炉巧克力布丁。(n)

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat (S3)
非凡的用餐场所（S3）
programme.desc: Ravneet Gill and Fred enjoy some marvellous Mallorcan munch as they dine at Ca Na Toneta and culinary hot spot Patiki, before sampling the famous ensaïmada breakfast pastry.(n)
拉夫尼特·吉尔 (Ravneet Gill) 和弗雷德 (Fred) 在 Ca Na Toneta 和美食热点 Patiki 享用美味的马略卡美食，然后品尝著名的 ensaïmada 早餐糕点。(n)

programme.title: Guillaume's Paris (S1)
纪尧姆的巴黎 (S1)
programme.desc: Guillaume Brahimi explores the 11th and 12th arrondissements of Paris; Guillaume visits the chocolate factory of Alain Ducasse.(n)
Guillaume Brahimi 探索巴黎第 11 区和第 12 区； 纪尧姆参观阿兰·杜卡斯的巧克力工厂。(n)

programme.title: Mary Berry Makes It Easy (S1)
玛丽·贝瑞让一切变得简单 (S1)
programme.desc: Mary joins Michael Ball on stage in the West End to teach him some new and exciting recipes - ideal for a keen cook who wants to be a little more adventurous.(n)
玛丽与迈克尔·鲍尔一起登上西区的舞台，教他一些令人兴奋的新食谱 - 对于想要更具冒险精神的热衷厨师来说是理想的选择。(n)

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes (S2)
贾森阿瑟顿的迪拜菜肴（S2）
programme.desc: Jason is on the beach in the coastal area of Jumeirah to delve into the art of pickling.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S5)
精彩酒店：大堂之外的生活（S5）
programme.desc: In the Alpine Tyrol region of Northern Italy lies Hotel Hubertus - a family run resort which offers spectacular views of the surrounding mountains thanks to its extraordinary architecture. Rob and Monica discover the unique Heaven and Hell spa, local ski experiences and are welcomed into the family behind the vision.(n)
Hotel Hubertus酒店位于意大利北部的阿尔卑斯蒂罗尔地区，是一家家庭经营的度假酒店，凭借其非凡的建筑风格，可以欣赏到周围群山的壮丽景色。 罗布和莫妮卡发现了独特的天堂与地狱水疗中心、当地的滑雪体验，并受到了这个愿景背后的家庭的欢迎。(n)

programme.desc: The bakers make classic canteen flapjacks, nostalgic school cake and a spectacular school fete Showstopper. Who'll be top of the class, and who will Mr Hollywood and Ms Leith expel from the tent?(n)

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4)

programme.desc: Today our seven remaining bakers take on Patisserie baking.(n)
今天，我们剩下的七位面包师开始进行糕点烘焙。(n)

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious (S1)
世界最奢华 (S1)
programme.desc: Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious private jets.(n)
加入我们，我们每周都会看看不同的奢侈品世界。 在本集中，我们将一睹世界上最豪华的私人飞机的内部。(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make (S1)
吉诺的意大利：就像妈妈以前做的那样（S1）
programme.desc: Gino is back exploring Tuscany - he visits a wheat farm, learns about Tuscan food traditions, goes to work at a vineyard and tastes some fine wine.(n)
吉诺回来探索托斯卡纳 - 他参观了小麦农场，了解了托斯卡纳的饮食传统，去葡萄园工作并品尝了一些上等葡萄酒。(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2)
里克斯坦的康沃尔 (S2)
programme.desc: Rick braves the notoriously wild Atlantic waters to learn about the ancient fishing method of handlining at Sennen Cove off Land's End. The catch of the day is some deliciously plump pollock, which Rick uses to make the ultimate fish pie for the head gardener of Tresillian House, John Harris.(n)
瑞克勇敢地面对臭名昭著的狂野大西洋水域，在天涯海角附近的森南湾 (Sennen Cove) 学习手工捕鱼的古老方法。 当天捕获的鱼是一些美味肥美的鳕鱼，瑞克用它为 Tresillian House 的首席园丁约翰·哈里斯 (John Harris) 制作了终极鱼饼。(n)

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S2)
完美的家 (S2)
programme.desc: Rachel and Mike were thrilled when they found a reasonably priced, spacious home in which to raise their children. It didn't take long living in it to discover its flaws.(n)
当雷切尔和迈克找到一套价格合理、宽敞的房子来抚养孩子时，他们非常兴奋。 在里面生活没多久就发现了它的缺陷。(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1)
Rachel Khoo 的巧克力 (S1)
programme.desc: Rachel explores chocolate's versatility. She mixes it with savoury in a polpette penne, and in Stockholm she learns about pairing drink with chocolate.(n)
雷切尔探索巧克力的多功能性。 她将其与咸味混合在 polpette penne 中，并在斯德哥尔摩学习了如何将饮料与巧克力搭配。(n)

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4)
伟大的澳大利亚烘焙大赛（S4）
programme.desc: Today our seven remaining bakers take on Patisserie baking.(n)
今天，我们剩下的七位面包师开始进行糕点烘焙。(n)

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious (S1)
世界最奢华 (S1)
programme.desc: Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious private jets.(n)
加入我们，我们每周都会看看不同的奢侈品世界。 在本集中，我们将一睹世界上最豪华的私人飞机的内部。(n)

programme.title: Guillaume's Paris (S1)
纪尧姆的巴黎 (S1)
programme.desc: Guillaume Brahimi explores the 13th and 14th arrondissements of Paris, and visits the artistic neighbourhood of Montparnasse.(n)
Guillaume Brahimi 探索巴黎第 13 区和第 14 区，并参观蒙帕纳斯艺术区。(n)

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes (S2)
贾森阿瑟顿的迪拜菜肴（S2）
programme.desc: Jason escapes the city on an epic adventure into the Hajar Mountains.(n)
杰森逃离城市，进入哈吉尔山脉进行史诗般的冒险。(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts (S1)
杰米的圣诞捷径（S1）
programme.desc: Jamie's recipes for a spectacular Christmas feast: the ultimate roast turkey, a show-stopping veggie centrepiece, a stuffing to please both meat-eaters and vegetarians, perfectly crunchy roasties and a super simple cheesecake.(n)
杰米的圣诞大餐食谱：终极烤火鸡、令人惊叹的蔬菜中心摆设、肉食者和素食者都满意的馅料、完美松脆的烤肉和超级简单的芝士蛋糕。(n)

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job (S2)
阿曼达和艾伦的意大利工作（S2）
programme.desc: The DIY duo face their biggest renovation challenge yet, as Alan aims to transform the medieval tower room into a movie theatre inspired by Cinema Paradiso.(n)
DIY 二人组面临着迄今为止最大的改造挑战，艾伦的目标是将中世纪的塔楼房间改造成受天堂电影院启发的电影院。(n)

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job (S2)
阿曼达和艾伦的意大利工作（S2）
programme.desc: Alan and Amanda are on the home stretch as they join forces to renovate the kitchen. Hoping to create the heart of their Italian home, the best friends aim to build an authentic rustic Tuscan design.(n)
艾伦和阿曼达联手翻新厨房，已进入最后冲刺阶段。 最好的朋友们希望打造意大利之家的中心，他们的目标是打造真正质朴的托斯卡纳设计。(n)

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (S3)
戈登拉姆齐的 24 小时地狱归来 (S3)
programme.desc: Gordon must revamp Lowery's Seafood, where his crew finds two brothers at odds and a dedicated team confused about where to look for leadership.(n)
戈登必须改造洛厄里海鲜餐厅，他的团队发现两个兄弟意见不合，而一支敬业的团队则对去哪里寻找领导感到困惑。(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make (S1)
吉诺的意大利：就像妈妈以前做的那样（S1）
programme.desc: Gino is back exploring Tuscany - he visits a wheat farm, learns about Tuscan food traditions, goes to work at a vineyard and tastes some fine wine.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts (S1)
杰米的圣诞捷径（S1）
programme.desc: Jamie's recipes for a spectacular Christmas feast: the ultimate roast turkey, a show-stopping veggie centrepiece, a stuffing to please both meat-eaters and vegetarians, perfectly crunchy roasties and a super simple cheesecake.(n)
杰米的圣诞大餐食谱：终极烤火鸡、令人惊叹的蔬菜中心摆设、肉食者和素食者都满意的馅料、完美松脆的烤肉和超级简单的芝士蛋糕。(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2)
里克斯坦的康沃尔 (S2)
programme.desc: Rick takes part in a rather unusual celebration called Oak Apple Day, marking the occasion when Charles II became king. And on the Cornish border with Devon, Rick meets a lamb farmer who is on a mission to rear the best lamb in the county, inspiring Rick to cook a delicious lamb stew called a Navarin.(n)
里克参加了一个相当不寻常的庆祝活动，称为橡苹果日，纪念查理二世成为国王的日子。 在康沃尔郡与德文郡的边境，瑞克遇到了一位羔羊农民，他的任务是饲养该县最好的羔羊，激励瑞克烹制美味的炖羊肉，称为纳瓦林。(n)

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less (S1)
杰米·奥利弗：少花钱做饭（S1）
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how easy it is to make a tasty dish with homemade Gnocchi. For a great veggie variation, Jamie bakes an enormous Yorkshire pudding filled with roasted veg and rich gravy and goes on to make an aromatic vegetarian broth. Chetna Makan shows viewers a great and simple dish to batch cook, chicken curry.(n)
杰米（Jamie）展示了用自制面疙瘩制作美味佳肴是多么容易。 为了做出美味的素食变化，杰米烘烤了一个巨大的约克郡布丁，里面充满了烤蔬菜和浓郁的肉汁，然后制作了芳香的素食肉汤。 Chetna Makan 向观众展示了一道美味又简单的批量烹饪菜肴：咖喱鸡。(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts (S1)
杰米的圣诞捷径（S1）
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates leftovers and transforms them into delicious dishes for between Christmas and New Year: A vegetable tarte tatin, Brussels sprouts Caesar salad, winter-veg gnocchi and a spectacular trifle from that gifted panettone!(n)
杰米庆祝圣诞节和新年期间的剩菜，并将它们变成美味佳肴：蔬菜馅饼、球芽甘蓝凯撒沙拉、冬季蔬菜汤圆和来自天才节日糕点的美味小点心！（n）

programme.title: Grand Designs (S21)
宏伟设计 (S21)
programme.desc: Every Grand Designs project has its challenges, and the triangle house in Billingshurst, West Sussex, certainly had its fair share. It saw one of the trickiest plots ever seen on the show.(n)
每个 Grand Designs 项目都有其挑战，西萨塞克斯比林斯赫斯特的三角房子当然也面临着挑战。 它见证了剧中最棘手的情节之一。(n)

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S6)
伟大的澳大利亚烘焙大赛（S6）
programme.desc: Twelve of Australia's best amateur bakers tackle three tricky cake challenges - a Signature personal story cake, a tricky Technical Raspberry and Black Pepper Curd cake, and a two tiered layer cake.(n)
十二名澳大利亚最好的业余面包师应对三个棘手的蛋糕挑战 - 一个签名个人故事蛋糕，一个棘手的技术覆盆子和黑胡椒凝乳蛋糕，以及一个两层蛋糕。(n)

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less (S1)
杰米·奥利弗：少花钱做饭（S1）
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how easy it is to make a tasty dish with homemade Gnocchi. For a great veggie variation, Jamie bakes an enormous Yorkshire pudding filled with roasted veg and rich gravy and goes on to make an aromatic vegetarian broth. Chetna Makan shows viewers a great and simple dish to batch cook, chicken curry.(n)
杰米（Jamie）展示了用自制面疙瘩制作美味佳肴是多么容易。 为了做出美味的素食变化，杰米烘烤了一个巨大的约克郡布丁，里面充满了烤蔬菜和浓郁的肉汁，然后制作了芳香的素食肉汤。 Chetna Makan 向观众展示了一道美味又简单的批量烹饪菜肴：咖喱鸡。(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs (S21)
宏伟设计 (S21)

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts (S1)
杰米的圣诞捷径（S1）
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates leftovers and transforms them into delicious dishes for between Christmas and New Year: A vegetable tarte tatin, Brussels sprouts Caesar salad, winter-veg gnocchi and a spectacular trifle from that gifted panettone!(n)
杰米庆祝圣诞节和新年期间的剩菜，并将它们变成美味佳肴：蔬菜馅饼、球芽甘蓝凯撒沙拉、冬季蔬菜汤圆和来自天才节日糕点的美味小点心！（n）

伟大的澳大利亚烘焙大赛（S4）
programme.desc: The bakers mix things up to create a fusion of things that aren't quite what they seem.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S6)
精彩酒店：大堂之外的生活（S6）

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2)
里克斯坦的康沃尔 (S2)
programme.desc: Rick takes part in a rather unusual celebration called Oak Apple Day, marking the occasion when Charles II became king. And on the Cornish border with Devon, Rick meets a lamb farmer who is on a mission to rear the best lamb in the county, inspiring Rick to cook a delicious lamb stew called a Navarin.(n)
里克参加了一个相当不寻常的庆祝活动，称为橡苹果日，纪念查理二世成为国王的日子。 在康沃尔郡与德文郡的边境，瑞克遇到了一位羔羊农民，他的任务是饲养该县最好的羔羊，激励瑞克烹制美味的炖羊肉，称为纳瓦林。(n)

programme.title: Guillaume's Paris (S1)
纪尧姆的巴黎 (S1)
programme.desc: Guillaume Brahimi explores the 13th and 14th arrondissements of Paris, and visits the artistic neighbourhood of Montparnasse.(n)
Guillaume Brahimi 探索巴黎第 13 区和第 14 区，并参观蒙帕纳斯艺术区。(n)
